src: "الما تعطى للمسافرين اللي كانو تيتسناو فدرجة حرارة 90(F). قال القائد ديال البومبية سكوت كونس: ""كان نهار سخون بزاف في سانتا كلارا ودرجات الحرارة وصلات للتسعينيات"". يلا دوزتي شي شوية ديال الوقت معلق فشي قطار أفعواني مغاديش تكون مرتاح، على الأقل، وبقاو شي ساعة على الأقل باش يخرجوا أول واحد من القطار."""
mt: "The passengers were given water at 90(F). The pilot of the fire truck said: "It was a hot day in Santa Clara and the temperatures were in the nineties." You can't sit in a hot train for a while without being comfortable, at least, and it took at least an hour for the first person to get out of the train."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: على حسب آخر تقرير عام، القراءات ديال مستوى سطح البحر كتبين باللي غادي يوقع تسونامي، لاحقاش تسجل نشاط تسونامي مؤكّد قريب من باغو باغو ونيو. موقعاتش خسائر أولا إصابات كبيرة ف تونغا، غير الضو اللي تقطع مؤقتان، الشيء اللي مخلاش السلطات تتوصل بالتحذير من تسونامي اللي طلقو مركز المحيط الهادي للتحذير من تسونامي PTWC. ربعتاش المدرسة كاينة على الخطوط الساحليّة أو قريبة منها شدات نهار الأربع كامل، واخا مبقاتش كاينة التحذيرات.
mt: According to the latest report, the readings of sea level are recorded in the tsunami, which will cause a tsunami, and the tsunami is recorded near Pago Pago and New. There are no major losses or injuries in Tonga, but the authorities have not been able to warn of the tsunami that the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center PTWC has issued. Schools are on the coast or near the coast, and the warnings are not yet available.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: سجل السيد جوني ريد، وهو سائق بالتناوب ففريق A1GP نيوزيلاندا، الاسم ديالو فالتاريخ اليوم حيت لأنه كان أسرع سائق قانوني فجسر ميناء أوكلاند فنيوزيلاندا واللي العمر ديالو 48 سنة. قدر السيد ريد أنه يسوق سيارة نيوزيلاندا A1GP Black Beauty بسرعة 160 كيلومتر فالساعة سبعة د المرات فوق الجسر. التقالة نتاع بلاك بيوتي معاوناتش لبوليس نتاع نيوزيلاندا باش يستعمل رادار دتحديد السرعة ويعرف شحال السرعة اللي كان غادي بيها السي ريد، ومرة وحدة اللي قدرو لبوليس يحسبو السرعة نتاع السي ريد هي فاش نزل السرعة ديالو ل 160 كيلومتر فالساعة.
mt: 48-year-old John Reid, a part-time driver for the New Zealand A1GP team, set a new legal speed record for the Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand today. Reid drove the New Zealand A1GP Black Beauty at 160 km/h (99 mph) over the bridge. The Black Beauty is equipped with a police radar to determine the speed of the car, and once the police calculated the speed of Reid's car, it was found to be 160 km/h (99 mph).
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: واحد الزلزال متوسط القوة ضرب مونتانا الغربية مع 10:08 دالليل، نهار الاثنين. متوصلش الماسح الجيولوجي الأمريكي (USGS) ولا المركز الوطني للمعلومات المتعلقةبالزلازل بحتى شي تقرير عن خسائر. الزلزال كان بعيد على ديلون ب 20 كيلومتر (15 ميل) فشمال الشمال الشرقي وعلى بوت ب 65 كيلومتر (40ميل) فالجنوب.
mt: A magnitude 4.0 earthquake struck western Montana at 10:08 pm, Monday. The U.S. Geological Survey (USGS) and the National Earthquake Information Center have not yet issued a report on damage. The earthquake was 20 kilometers (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and 65 kilometers (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: ناضت العافية في الحبس ديال أبو غريب في العراق فاش وقعات أحداث الشغب. ولات المسعة نتاع لحبس خايبة مورا مابانت المعاملة الطايح دلحباسة من بعد ماشد العسكر دميريكان لحبس.
mt: The prison was on fire after riots broke out. The prison was abandoned after the military destroyed the prison.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: الفرقه لغات العرض لي كان فملعب ماوز وار ميمريال، ولي كان غادي يحضر ليه 9000 واحد، و اعتذرات من الجماهير. الشركة ديال الفرقه، HK Management Inc، ماعطات حتا سبب فاللول فاش لغاو العرض ف 20 شهر تسعود (9). ولكن فالنهار الثاني ردّات اللومة للأسباب اللوجيستيكية.
mt: 9000 people were expected to attend the game at Mawz War Memorial, but the team was forced to cancel the game. The team's management company, HK Management Inc, did not give a reason for the cancellation in the first statement, but in the second statement blamed logistical issues.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "الشفرة بقات الليلة كلها، لاحقاش مكنوش لبوليس فالشارع د بيشكيك. قال أحد المراقبين كيفما شاف مدينة بيشكيك أنها غارقة في حالة من ""فقدان السيطرة،"" حيث عصابات من الناس كتدور في الزناقي وكينهبوا مخازن السلع الاستهلاكية. لعديد من السكان ديال بيشكيك لامو المتظاهرين من الجنوب على عدم القانونية ديالهم."
mt: "The code is all gone tonight, the police are nowhere to be seen in the streets of Bishkek. One observer said that the city of Bishkek was "out of control," where gangs of people were roaming the streets and looting stores. Many residents of Bishkek are angry at the protesters from the south for their illegality."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: "لاحظ الرئيس التنفيذي ديال شركة رينغ أنها بدات فاش مكانش سرسار ديال الدلر ديالو مكانش كيتسمع فالكرلج دالمحل ديالو. قال بالي راه صنع سونيط ديال الباب كيخدم بالويفي. قال سيمينوف أن المبيعات طلعات مورا فاش بان فواحد الحلقة ديال شارك تانك فاش مبغاتش لجنة البرنامج أنها تمول الشركة اللي طالعة. في التالي ديال عام 2017، ""سيمينوف"" داز فواحد القناة ديال التسوق في التلفزيون سميتها كيو في سي. شركة رينغ سوات الدعوة القضائية مع شركة أمن منافسة سميتها ADT."
mt: "The CEO of Ring noticed that when there was no longer a dollar sign in his wallet, he was no longer heard in the local market. He said that he made a part of the door that works with Wi-Fi. Seminov said that sales went down after a tank show when the program committee did not fund the company that went down. In the following year of 2017, ""Seminov"" went to a shopping channel on television called QVC. Ring sued a competing security company called ADT."
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "برنامج PBS عندو كتر 24 إيمي أوارد، والمدة ديالو قل من سيسام و ميستر رودجر نيبورهود. كل حلقة من البرنامج كتركز على موضوع في شي كتاب ومن بعد كيستكشفوه من خلال بزاف ديال ال قصص. كل حلقة من البرنامج كتقدم توصيات بشي كتب خاص الدراري يدوروا عليها فاش يمشيوا للمكتبة. قال جون غرانت، من محطة WNED Buffalo التلفزية (قناة Reading Rainbow)، ""أن Reading Rainbow علمت الأطفال علاش تيقراو،... وحب لقراية — [العرض] شجع الأطفال على أنهم يهزو كتاب ويقراو."" بعض الناس شايفين، ومنهم جون جرانت، أن الأزمة ديال التمويل والتحول في الفلسفة ديال البرامج التلفزيونية التعليمية هي الي أدت باش يتسالى هاذ المسلسل."
mt: 24 Emmy Awards, shorter than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focuses on a topic in a book and explores it through several stories. Each episode offers recommendations for books for teachers to focus on when taking their classes to the library. John Grant, of PBS station WNED Buffalo, said, "Reading Rainbow taught children why to read,... and love of reading — [the show] encouraged children to be readers of books." Some people, including John Grant, believe that the funding crisis and the shift in philosophy of educational television programs led to the cancellation of this series.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: المسؤولين ديال مدينة أمستردام ومتحف آن فرانك تيقولو أن الشدرة كانت متأثر بالفطريات وكتشكل خطر على الصحة العامة وقالو أنه كان خطر ديال أنها قريبة تطيح. كان مقرر أنها تتعدم نهار الثلاثاء، ولكن أنقذها واحد لحكم مستعجل من المحكمة.
mt: Officials in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank House said the house was affected by mold and posed a health risk, and said it was likely to collapse. It was scheduled to be demolished on Tuesday, but was saved by a temporary injunction from the court.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "كتطالب جمعية تحرير الحيوانات والجمعية الملكية لمنع القسوة على الحيوانات (RSPCA) مرة أخرى بالتركيب الإلزامي ديال كاميرات المراقبة في جميع المسالخ في أستراليا. قال دافيد أوشانسيسي رئيس المفتشين ديال RSPA د نيو ساوث ويلز لقناة ABC أن مراقية وتفتيش المذابح خاص تكون مألوفة فأستراليا. ""كاميرات لمراقبة غتسيفط اشارات قوية لناس اللي كيخدمو مع الحيوانات بأن السلامة ديالها هي الاولويه لقصوي""."
mt: "The RSPCA and Animal Liberation are again calling for mandatory CCTV in all abattoirs in Australia. David O'Shannessy, RSPCA NSW inspector, told ABC that monitoring and inspecting abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""CCTV sends a strong message to people working with animals that their safety is paramount."""
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: انتشر خبر فجماعة ريد ليك اليوم أن واحد التلميذ تشد عندو علاقة بإطلاق النار فالمدرسة اللي وقع فمارس 21 فالوقت اللي كانت جنازة ديال جيف وييز وثلاثة من الضحايا التسعود. وما هضراتش السلطات رسمياً غير شوية باش تأكد الاعتقال اللي وقع هاذ النهار. ولكن واحد مصدر مطلع على مجريات التحقيق قال لصحيفة مينيابوليس ستار تريبيون إن الفاعل لويس جوردن، ولد الرئيس القبلي لريد ليك فلويد جوردن اللي عنده 16 عام ما زال ما تعرفاتش في هاذ الوقت التهم اللي غادي توجهها أو شنو اللي خلا السلطات تدور على هاذ الولد ولكن الإجراءات المتعلقة بالأحداث بدأت في المحكمة الفيدرالية.
mt: A student was arrested today in connection with the shooting at the school where the March 21 shooting occurred at the time of the funeral of Jeff Weise and three of the victims. The authorities have not officially confirmed the arrest, but a source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star Tribune that the shooter, Louis J. Jordan, son of the tribal president of Red Lake, Floyd J. Jordan, who is 16 years old, has not yet been charged with the allegations or what caused the authorities to focus on this boy, but the proceedings related to the events began in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: قالو النظمين نتاع الاضراب أن تقريبا 100,000 شخص خرجو فمدن ألمانية بحال برلين وكولون وهامبورغ وهانوفر. قدّرت الشرطة عدد المتظاهرين بـ 6500 متظاهراً في برلين. المظاهرات كانو حتى فباريس و صوفبا فبلغاريا و فيلنيوس فليتوانيا وفاليتا فمالطا وتالين فإستونيا وإيدنبرغ وغلاسغو فسكوتلاندا. احتج ما يقرب من 200 شخص، في لندن، قدام مكاتب بعض أصحاب حقوق الطبع والنشر الكبار. كانت مظاهرات كبيرة فبولاندا الشهر اللي فات حيت هاد البلد وقع على الاتفاقية ديال مكافحة التزييف التجارية الشيء اللي خلا الحكومة البولندية تقرر عدم تغيير الاتفاقية حاليا. أخرت لاتيفا و سلوفاكيا الالتحاق بالاتفاقية ديال مكافحة التزييف التجارية.
mt: 100,000 people took to the streets in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, Hanover. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests were held in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valletta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. About 200 people protested outside the offices of some major copyright holders in London. There were large protests in Poland last month after the country signed the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement, which led the Polish government to decide not to change the agreement at this time. Latvia and Slovakia have delayed joining the Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "الناس يلغت على شي 60 حالة كان فيها مشكل زيادة درجة الحرارة ديال جهاز ""آي بود""، وهاذشي كان السبب تقريبا في ستة ديال الحرائق وإصابة أربعة ديال ناس بحروق خفيفة. قالت وزارة الاقتصاد والتجارة والصناعة (ميتي) أنها كانت عارفة الحوادث 27 المتعلقين بالأجهزة. صرحت وزارة الاقتصاد والتجارة والصناعة أن أبل علماتها بالحوادث ال34 النشيطة الإضافية اللي سماتها الشركة ""ماشي خطيرة."" ردات الوزارة وقالت أن التأجيل نتاع التقرير د آبل ""مؤسف بزاف."""
mt: 60 people were injured in a total of 34 incidents involving overheating of Apple iPods, which were the cause of six fires and four minor burns. The Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) was aware of 27 of the incidents. METI said Apple had reported 34 additional incidents, which it classified as "not serious." METI said Apple's delay in reporting the incidents was "regrettable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "ستيف جوبز، الرئيس التنفيذي ديال شركة أبل، ورا الجهاز للناس وهو ماشي على المنصة وخرج الأيفون من جيب سرواله ديال الجينز. وفي هاذ الخطاب دياله اللي بقى ساعتين قال ""هاذ النهار، شركة أبل غادي تخترع التليفون عاود ثاني، غادي نصنعوا التاريخ هاذ النهار""."
mt: "Steve Jobs, Apple's CEO, was not on the stage and pulled the iPhone from his jeans pocket. In his two-hour speech, he said, "Today, Apple will reinvent the phone, we will make history today.""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: كريستينا فرنانديز دي كيرشنر وهي عضوة مجلس الشيوخ دابا وسيدة الأرجنتين الأولى قالت باللي غادية تترشح للرئاسة البارح بالعشية في لابلاتا، وهي مدينة بعيدة بـ 50 كيلومتراً (أو 31 ميلاً) على بوينس آيرس صرحت السيدة كريشنر في المسرح الأرجنتيني على أنها غاترشح للرئاسة، وهاد لبلاصة هي لبلاصة الي كانت بدات فيها الحملة ديالها د 2005 للترشح لمجلس شيوخ كعضو في مجلس مقاطعة بوينوس أيريس.
mt: 2005 Argentine legislative election
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: لقات ACMA بلي واخا تلاح الفيديو فلانترنت، بيغ برادر( Big Brother) منتهكش القوانين ديال الرقابة على المحتوى فلانترنت حيتان مخزنوش الوسائط فالموقع ديال بيغ برادر. القانون ديال خدمات البث كينص على التنظيم ديال المحتوى فلانترنت، واخا هاكاك باش يكون بصّح محتوى ديال لانترنت خاصو يكون خدام على السيرفور
mt: ACMA has asked Big Brother to remove the video from the internet, as it breaches the content regulation laws. The Broadcasting Services Act requires that internet content be hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "بيتر كوستيلو، أمين الصندوق الأسترالي اللي محتمل أنه يجي بلاصت رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد فقيادة الحزب الليبرالي عبر على الدعم ديالو باش تكون صناعة الطاقة النووية فأستراليا. قال السيد كوستيلو أنه فاش غيصبح إنتاج الطاقة النووية متاح اقتصاديا غادي تبدا أستراليا الاستعمال ديالو. وقال السيد كوستيلو: ""يلا ولات القضية تجارية، خاصنا نمتكله. بمعنى، أنه مكاينش اعتراض من حيث المبدأ على الطاقة النووية""."
mt: "Peter Costello, the Australian treasurer who is widely expected to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has said that once nuclear power production becomes economically viable, Australia will begin using it. Costello said, ""If it becomes a commercial proposition, we should go for it. In other words, there is no principled objection to nuclear power."""
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: كاينين غير 18 ميدالية كل نهار، داكشي باش شي دول موصلوش منصة التتويج. من بينهم هولاندا , اللي خدات من خلال Anna Jochemsen آنا يوشمسن المركز التاسع في فئة السيدات فْ سوبر ج Super-G البارح , أو فنلندا مع Katja Saarinen كاتجا سارينن اللي خدات المركز العاشر فنفس الحدث. خذا الأسترالي ميتشل جورلي المركز الحداش في بطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. وخذا المنافس التشيكي أولدريش جيلينك المركز الستاش في بطولة سوبر-جي للرجال. خذا المركز الخمستاش المكسيكي أرلي فلاسكويز في سباق سوبر جي في وضع الجّلوس للرجال. وخذا آدم هول النيوزيلندي المركز التّاسع في بطولة سوبر جي في وضع الوقوف للرجال. المتزلج الضعيف البصر البولندي ماسيج كريزيل والمرشدة آنا أوغارزينسكا جابو المركز 13 فمسابقة السوبر-جي. وجاب الكوري الجنوبي يونغ سيورك بارك المركز 24 فمسابقة سوبر-جي للرجال للجالسين.
mt: 18 medals were awarded each day, so some countries did not win a podium. Among them was the Netherlands, which won through Anna Jochemsen the ninth place in the women's Super-G yesterday, or Finland with Katja Saarinen who won the tenth place in the same event. The Australian Mitchell Gourley won the fifth place in the men's Super-G. The Czech competitor Oldrich Gelink won the sixth place in the men's Super-G. The Mexican Arli Flakus won the ninth place in the men's Super-G sitting. The New Zealand Adam Hol won the ninth place in the men's Super-G standing. The visually impaired Polish skier Maciej Krezel and the guide Anna Ogarek won the 13th place in the Super-G. The South Korean skier Park Young Seok won the 24th place in the men's Super-G sitting.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "كانت المحاكمة فمحكمة برمنغهام كراون/ Birmingham Crown وانتهت ف تلاتة/3 غشت. المقدم اللي تشد فلبلاصة نكر لهجوم وقال أنه كان مخبي مور السارية باش يحمي راسو من لقراعي اللي كانو تيرميو عليه تقريبا شي 30 دناس. وتوجهات كذلك لبليك تهمة محاولة إفساد مسار العدالة. قال القاض لبلاك أنه غايمشي للحبس ""مافيهاش""."
mt: "The trial at Birmingham Crown Court ended on August 3. The officer who was charged with the attack said he was hiding behind the railing to protect his head from the stones thrown at him by about 30 people. He was also charged with attempting to obstruct the course of justice. The judge said the black was going to prison ""no"". "
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: من بين المواضيع اللي مسطرة فبالي كاين الحفاظ على داكشي لي باقي دالغابات فالعالم، ومشاركة التكنولوجيا اللي غاتعاون الدول النامية باش تطور بشكل أقل تلوثي. الأمم المتحدة كتمنى تكمل إنشاء صندوق تعاون بيه البلدان اللي تضررات من الاحتباس الحراري باش يتعاملو مع الآثار ديالو. يقدرو لفلوس يتستخدمو فلبني نتاع ديور مضادين للفياضانات والماء الصالح للشرب والتنويع دالغلة.
mt: Among the issues on the agenda are preserving what remains of the world's forests, and sharing technology to help developing countries grow in a less polluting way. The United Nations hopes to complete the creation of a fund for countries affected by climate change to deal with its effects. They can use the money to build flood-resistant buildings, safe drinking water and diversified crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "قالت نيجيريا سابف أنها ناوية تنضم ل AfCFTA فالأسبوع اللي من بعد القمة. قال مفوض التجارة والصناعة في الاتحاد الأفريقي ألبرت موشانجا أن بنين غادي تنضم. قال المفوض، ""مزال ماتفقنا على القوانين ديال البلاد و الضريبه، ولكن الإطار لي عندنا كافي باش تبدا التجارة فشهر سبعة2020""."
mt: "Nigeria said it would join the AfCFTA next week. Albert Muchanga, the African Union's trade and industry commissioner, said Benin would join. The commissioner said, "We have not agreed on the laws of the country and the tax, but the framework we have is enough to start trading in July 2020.""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: تلقات بزاف دالإشادة فاش كانت فأطلنطا وتعرفات بالتعليم الحضري المبتكر. حصلت على لقب المشرف الوطني للعام سنة 2009. في وقت منح الجائزة تحسنات نتائج مدارس أتلانتا بزاف في درجات الاختبار. مور داكشي بشوية نشرات أطلانطا جورنال كونستيتوشن تقرير تيبين مشاكل نتائج التجربة. بين التقرير أن نتائج لمتحان تزادت بسكل كبير، وقال أن لمدرسة لقات شي مشاكل داخلية ولكن متعاملاتش مع النتائج. بين الدليل من بعد باللي راه وقع التلاعب في الاوراق ديال الامتحانات واتهموا فيها هال و34 موظف آخر في التعليم في عام 2013.
mt: The award-winning Atlanta public school system was praised in 2009 for its innovative education. The school system received the National Superintendent of the Year award. At the time the award was given, the school system had improved test scores in Atlanta. The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with the experiment. The report said that test scores increased dramatically, and that the school had internal problems but did not deal with the results. The report also accused 34 other employees of the school system of cheating in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: تفكعات واحد القنبلة برا دلمكتب دالحاكم العام. تلاتتْ القنابل آخرين تفركعو حدا المباني الحكومية فظرف ساعتين. شي تقارير تتقول أن عدد الوفيات الرسمي هو 8 والتقارير الرسمية تتقول أن 30 تصابو؛ ولكن مازال الأرقام نهائية متعرفاتش.
mt: 1 bomb exploded outside the Prime Minister's office. Three other bombs exploded near government buildings in the space of two hours. Official reports say eight people were killed and 30 were injured, but the numbers are not final.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: جيسوس اللي عنده 21 عام مشى لمانشستر سيتي العام اللي فات في يناير 2017 وكان جاي من نادي بالميراس البرازيلي بمقابل 27 مليون جنيه إسترليني. من ديك لوقت بان اللاعب البرازيلي ف 53 ماتش مع النادي فكاع المنافسات وماركا 24 بيت.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus, who moved to Manchester City last January from Brazilian club Palmeiras for £27 million, has played 53 matches for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: طاح واحد الأوطيل صغير ف مكة المكرمة، المدينة المقدسة ديال الإسلام تقريبا ف 10 ديال الصباح هاذ النهار بالتوقيت المحلي. هاد الدار كانو ساكنين فيها واحد العداد ديال الحجاج لي جاو باش يزورو المدينة ملي كان الحج. أغلب النزلاء نتاع لوطيل من هما مواطنين من الإمارات العربية المتحدة. عَلْ الأقل 15 واحد لي ماتو، وهاد العدد يقدر يزيد.
mt: A small hotel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam, around 10 am local time. The hotel was home to a count of pilgrims who came to visit the city during the Hajj. Most of the hotel's guests are citizens of the United Arab Emirates. At least 15 people are dead, and this number may increase.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: تزادحو جوج ساتيليتات تيوزنو 1,000 باوند وتيدورو تقريبا بسرعة 17,500 ميل فالساعة على لعلو نتا 491 ميل فوق الأرض. تيقولو العلماء أن الانفجار اللي وقع بسبب الاصطدام كان ضخم. باقي كيحاولو يحددو حجمالكبر ديال الإنهيار وكيفاش غادي تتأثر الأرض. القيادة الإستراتيجية الأمريكية ديال مكتب وزارة الدفاع الأمريكية كتقوم بتعقب الأنقاض. نتائج التخطيط التحليلي غادي تنشر فالسيت العمومي.
mt: 1,000-pound satellites were destroyed and tumbled at about 17,500 miles per hour at an altitude of about 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion was huge. They are trying to determine the size of the collapse and how the Earth will be affected. The American Defense Department's Office of Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis will be published on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: تزادحو جوج ساتيليتات تيوزنو 1,000 باوند وتيدورو تقريبا بسرعة 17,500 ميل فالساعة على لعلو نتا 491 ميل فوق الأرض. تيقولو العلماء أن الانفجار اللي وقع بسبب الاصطدام كان ضخم. باقي كيحاولو يحددو حجمالكبر ديال الإنهيار وكيفاش غادي تتأثر الأرض. القيادة الإستراتيجية الأمريكية ديال مكتب وزارة الدفاع الأمريكية كتقوم بتعقب الأنقاض. نتائج التخطيط التحليلي غادي تنشر فالسيت العمومي.
mt: 1,000-pound satellites were destroyed and tumbled at about 17,500 miles per hour at an altitude of about 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion was huge. They are trying to determine the size of the collapse and how the Earth will be affected. The American Defense Department's Office of Strategic Command is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis will be published on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: باتن وصل للمركز 190 في القائمة ديال أغنى 400 أمريكي في عام 2008 ووصلات الثروة دياله لـ 2.3 مليار دولار. راه تخرّج من كلية الآداب والعلوم في جامعة فرجينيا عام 1950 وكان متبرع مهم لهاذ المؤسسة.
mt: 190th in the list of the richest 400 Americans in 2008, with a net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "وقع حاكم ولاية كاليفورنيا أرنولد شوارزنيجر على مشروع قانون يحظر بيع أو تأجير ألعاب الفيديو العنيفة للقصر. القانون كيتطلب أن العاب الفيديو في ولاية كاليفورنيا تدير علامة ""18"" و كيخرج كعقوبة دلبيع للصغار غرامة 1000 دولار."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires video games in California to be labeled ""18"" and carries a fine of $1,000 as a penalty for selling to minors."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "دوفال، مزوج وعنده جوج ولاد كبار ، ومقدرش بأثر على ميلر اللي كان المحور ديال القصة. ""مايلر قال فاش طلبو التعليق على الأمر، مايك هدر بزاف فالجلسة، و حيتاش كنت كنتوجّد، بصح مسمعتش اشنو كان كيقول."""
mt: "Dove, who is married and has two adult children, said he was unable to comment on Miller, who was the focus of the story. "Miller said when asked for comment, he was very upset during the meeting, and since I was there, I heard what he was saying."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "وافق رئيس الوزراء ستيفن هاربر أنه يسيفط 'قانون الهواء النظيف' لمجلس الأحزاب باش يراجعوه، قبل من القراءة الثانية، من بعد الاجتماع د التلات د 25 دقيقة مع قائد الحزب الوطني الديمقراطي NDP جاك لايتون فمقر رئيس الوزراء. فاللقاء ديالو مع رئيس الوزراء، طلب السيد لايتون تغيير مشروع قانون البيئة اللي قدموه المحافظين وطلب ""إعادة كتابة شاملة وكاملة"" لمشروع البيئة اللي قدمو الحزب المحافظ. ومن الوقت فاش تدخّلت الحكومة الفيدرالية باش تاخذ تمويل سبيطار ميرسي في دافنبورت في تسمانيا، انتقدت الحكومة ديال الولاية وبعض النواب الفيدراليين هاذ شي لحقاش شافوها بحال حيلة على ود الدخلة ديال الانتخابات الفيدرالية اللي المفروض غادي تكون في نونبر. ولكن رئيس الوزراء جون هوارد قال أن هاذشي كان غير باش يحمي مرافق السبيطار من تخفيض التصنيف ديالها من حكومة تسمانيا وعطاوهم 45 مليون دولار أسترالي إضافية."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the 'Clean Air Act' to the opposition parties for review, before the second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the Prime Minister's office. The meeting with the Prime Minister, Layton asked to change the Conservative Party's environmental bill and asked for a "comprehensive and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environmental bill. Since the federal government took over the funding of the Mercy Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs criticized this as a "trick" to see the federal election, which is supposed to be in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said this was only to protect the hospital from the state government's downgrade and gave them an additional $45 million Australian."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: لقاو حمض السيانوريك والميلامين في عينات البول ديال الحيوانات الأليفة اللي ماتت من بعد ما كلات ماكلة ملوثة ديال الحيوانات الأليفة. باحثون في الجامعة قالو أن المركبين كيتفاعلو مع بعض باش يكونو بلورات مكتخليش الكلوة دير خدمتها. لاحظو لباحثين أن لكريستال تيتشكل فلبول نتاع لقط فاش كيتزاد لميلامين وحمض السيانوريك. التكوين ديال هاد الكريسطالات كيتشابه مع هاديك لي كاينا فالبول ديال الحيوانات الأليفه لي مريضه فاش كنقارنوها بالتنظير الطيفي لي بالأشعة تحت الحمرا (FTIR).
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of pets that died after eating contaminated pet food. Researchers at the university said the compounds interacted to form crystals that serve as a substitute for urea. Researchers noted that the crystals formed in the urine of a cat as the melamine and cyanuric acid increased. The composition of these crystals is similar to those found in the urine of sick pets when compared to infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "قالت شينهوا أن محققين دلحكومة لقاو جوج دصنادي كحلين نتاع التسجيل دالرحلة نهار لابرع. وحتى المصارعين اللي معاهم شكروا في لونا. قال تومي دريمر ""بلّي لونا كانت مصارعة واعره. و بلي الماندجر ديالي لونا ماتت فواحد الليلة فريدة مَن نوعها بحالها بحال أمها."" علق داستن ""جولدست"" رانلز وقال: ""لونا كانت غريبة الأطوار بحالي... وربما أكثر مني... كنبغيها وغادي نتوحشها... كنتمنى تكون في بلاصة أفضل."""
mt: "Shinewa said investigators found two people who registered for the flight on the day of the crash. Even the wrestlers who thanked her in the ring. Tommy Dreamer said, 'Luna was a wrestler and a mother. And my Mandrake was a mother like no other.' Dustin 'Goldust' Runnels commented, 'Luna was a strange one like me... and maybe more than me... I wanted to be like her and I wanted to beat her... I wish she was in a better place.'"
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: واخا كان في الدار ثلاثة ديال الناس منين دخلات فيها الطوموبيل، ولكن حتى واحد فيهم ما وقعات له شي حاجة. لكن تصاب الشيفور بجروح خطيرة في الرأس. تسدات الطريق اللي وقع فيها لصطدام مؤقتا فلوقت اللي كانت ليزيرجونس كتعتق السيد من وسط لأودي TT لحمرا. وكان دخل في البداية لمستشفى جيمس باجيت في جريت يارموث. وعاد تنقل من بعد لمستشفى أدنبروك في كامبريدج.
mt: 3 people were in the car, but only one was injured. The driver was seriously injured in the head. The road was closed temporarily while the police were investigating the crash. The man was initially taken to James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: بداو ليماتش مع 10 دصباح وكان الجو مزيان من غير الندى نتاع الصباح اللي مشا دغيا، كان نهار واعر لسباعيات الريغبي. جنوب إفريقيا لّي هي اللّولة فالبطولة، مشات مزيان فاش ربحات بستّا و عشرين (26) لزيرو (0) ضد زامبيا لّي مْصنفة الخامسة. بالرغم أنهم بانو ضعاف فالماتش ضد الشقيقات الجنوبيات ديالهم إلا أن جنوب إفريقيا تطورات بشكل مستمر بتقدم البطولة. الدفاع لمظم ومهارات شدات دلكرة وتعاون الفريق ديالهم عونوهم باش يغلبو وكان باين أن هاداك هو الفريق اللي غيغلبوه.
mt: 10 am kick-off and the weather was fine with no morning fog, it was a sunny day for the rugby sevens. South Africa, who are first in the tournament, went well beating Zambia, who are fifth, by 26-0. Despite losing to their sister team, South Africa has improved throughout the tournament. The defense, strong tackles and team work helped them win and it was clear that this was the team that would beat them.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: وخلال العقود الثلاثة اللي فات ة، أسست الصين اقتصاداً سوقياً واخا بقائها رسمياً دولة شيوعية. تدارت الإصلاحات لقتصادية اللولة فلوقت نتاع دينغ شياوبينغ. من ديك لوقت كبر لقتصاد نتاع الصين بضعف تسعين مرة. أول مر ة الصين في العام اللي فات كتصدر طوموبيلات أكثر من ألمانيا، ودازت امريكا اللي هي أكبر سوق في هاذ الصناعة. ممكن يولي الناتج المحلي الإجمالي للصين كبر من ديال امريكا ف عشرين عام.
mt: During the three decades that have passed, China has built a market economy and officially remained a communist state. The first economic reforms were made under Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown by 90 times. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany, and surpassed the United States, which is the largest market in this industry. In twenty years, China's gross domestic product may surpass that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: """"" قال بلي غادي نحاولو نقصو من ثنائي أوكسيد الكربون لكل وحدة من الناتج الداخلي الإجمالي من هنا ل 2020 مقارنة مع المستوى ديال 2005. ولكن محددش شحال الرقم ديال التخفيضات، قال غير باللي راه غادي يعتمد على الناتج الاقتصادي ديال الصين. وشجع هو البلدان النامية ""باش ما يمشيوش في الطريق القديم اللي كيمشي على مبدأ نلوثوا دابا و ننظفوا من بعد"". وزاد قال ""باللي راه واخا هكاك ما خاصش حتى شي حد يطلب منهم يتحملوا التزامات كتتجاوز مرحلة التطوير والمسؤولية والقدرات ديالهم""."
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of gross domestic product here to 2020 compared to the 2005 level," he said, adding that the target would depend on China's economic growth. He also urged developing countries not to "follow the old path of polluting now and cleaning up later." He added that "no one should ask them to take on commitments that exceed their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "قالت الخيرية نتاع الأدوية مانغولا ومنظمة أطباء بلا حدود ومنظمة الصحة العالمية أنه أسوء انتشار تسجل فلبلاد. السيد لي كيهدر بسميةْ منظمة الأطباء فسانس فرونتير ريتشارد فيرمان قال بلي: ""أنغولا غاديا وكتنتشر فيها الحرب لأخيب درجة، ومزال الوضع فأنغولا"" خايب بزاف."
mt: "Médecins Sans Frontières, the World Health Organization and the pharmaceutical company Médecins du Monde said it was the worst outbreak ever recorded in the country. Dr. Richard Ferman, a spokesman for Doctors Without Borders, said: "Angola is going through a war and the situation in Angola is very bad.""
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: مدير النيابة العامة كير ستارمر عطى الحكم نتاع هون و بريس هاد الصباح. استقال هوهن وغادي يتبدل في مجلس الوزراء بعضو البرلمان إيد ديفي. ومن المتوقع أنه ياخذ عضو البرلمان نورمان لامب وظيفة وزير الأعمال اللي غيخويها ديفي. هوهن وبرايس غادي يحضر محكمة قضاة ويستمينستر في 16 فبراير
mt: Home Secretary Theresa May handed down the verdict this morning.  Home and former Defence Secretary Liam Fox resigned from the Cabinet and will be replaced in the House of Commons by former Health Secretary Andrew Lansley.  It is expected that Lansley will take over the role of Business Secretary, which Fox had been holding.  Fox and former Chief Whip Andrew Mitchell will appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "القصة اللي تقدمات فالأوبيرا لفرنسية، الي كتبها كاميل سانت سينس، هي نتاع واحد لفنان ""اللي الحياة نتاعو فيها غير لحب نتاع لادروك وليابان."" ونتيجة لذاكشي، كيدخن الفنانين جوانات د لحشيش على خشبة المسرح، وكيشجع المسرح براسه الجمهور باش يشاركهم في ذاكشي."
mt: "The story that is presented in the French opera, which was written by Camille Saint-Saëns, is that of a painter who is in love with a young woman who is the daughter of a drug dealer." As a result, the young artists smoke hashish on stage, and the theater itself encourages the audience to participate.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "كان لونوف، اللي معروف أيضا ب ""رائد الفضاء رقم 11""، جزء من الفريق الأصلي لرواد الفضاء في الاتحاد السوفياتي. دار ف18 مارس 1965 أول نشاط برا مركبة فضائية (EVA) تيديرو إنسان، ""أو المشي في الفضاء""، وبقا برا دالمركبة لمدة فوق 12 دقيقة. خذا الوسام ديال ""بطل الاتحاد السوفيتي الأول""، وهو أعلى وسام شرفي في الاتحاد السوفيتي، بسبب الخدمة دياله. من بعد عشر سنين، قاد السوفيات واحد الطرف من المهمة ديال أبولو سويز و لي كيعني أن السباق ديال الفضاء سالا."
mt: "Leonov, who was also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11," was part of the original team of Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first EVA by a human, "or the walk in space," and remained outside the spacecraft for more than 12 minutes. He was awarded the title of "Hero of the Soviet Union," the highest honor in the Soviet Union, for his service. Ten years later, he led the Soviet side of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which ended the space race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "بعدما وقعت الحادثة، نقلوا ""جبسون"" للسبيطار، ولكن مات من بعد بواحد الشوية. الشيفور ديال الشاحنة لي عندو 64رَبْعَة أو ستين عام ماتصابش جروح فْ الحادث. السيارة تحيدات من بلاصة الكسيدة مع 12طْناعَش بتوقيت جرينتش في نفس اليوم . وقال واحد السيد كيخدم في كراج قريب من البلاصة اللي وقعات فيها الحادثة: ""كان كاين تما واحد الدراري كيتسناو يقطعوا الطريق وكلهم كانوا كيغوتوا ويبكيوا."" كلهم هربو راجعين من بلاصة الكسيدة."
mt: "After the incident, Gibson was taken to the hospital, but died shortly after. The driver of the truck, who is 64 years old, was injured in the accident. The car veered off the road at 12:15 GMT on the same day. A man who works at a nearby garage said: "There was a lot of blood on the road and everyone was crying." They all fled back to the scene."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: كانت الخدمة لي دَّارت في الغالب نظرية, ولكن تكتب البرنامج لمحاكاة الملاحظات لي دَّارت على مجرة القوس. الآثار اللي كان باغيها الفريق ممكن تتسبب فيها قوى المد والجزر بين المادة لكحلا نتاع المجرة و لمادة لكحلا نتاع درب التبانة. بحال كيفما القمر تيأثر على الأرض ويسبب المد والجزر فحتى درب التبانة تيطبق قوة على مجرة القوس. لعلماء قالو أن لمادة لكحلا كتأثر على مادة كحلا أخرى بنفس الطريقة اللي كتأثر المادة العادية. هاذ النظرية كتقول أن اغلبية المادة المظلمة كتكون على شكل هالة كدُّور على المجرة .وكتْكَوَّن من بزاف ديال الجسيمات الصغيرة.
mt: The service was largely theoretical, but the program wrote down the observations that were made on the Sagittarius galaxy. The effects that the team wanted to cause could be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the galaxy's dark matter. Like how the moon affects the Earth and causes tides in the galaxy, the galaxy affects the Sagittarius galaxy. Scientists say that dark matter affects dark matter in the same way that ordinary matter affects it. This theory says that most of the dark matter is in the form of a halo around the galaxy. It is made up of small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "كثر النقاش بسباب الهدرا على خسران الفلوس فالإنقاذ و إعاة الإعمار على ضوء إعصار كاترينا ولي وصفوها شي ناس محافضين ماليين بطريقة مضحكة أنه ""صفقة نيو أورلينز ديال بوش"". النقد اليبيرالي لجهود إعادة الترميم ركز على إرساء عقود إعادة البناء لالعاملين بالبيت الأبيض."
mt: "The debate over the waste of money in the rescue and rebuilding efforts in the wake of Hurricane Katrina and the Gulf Coast described by some as "Bush's New Orleans deal" focused on the rebuilding contracts awarded to the White House staff."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "فاش غادي يدخل القمر الصناعي للأرض و الغلاف الجوي تقريبا معا الخمسة ديال الصباح على حساب التوقيت الشرقي، باينا غادي يقدمو واحد العرض خفيف للناس فشمال كاليفورنيا و أوريجون و نيفادا و يوتا. غادي يبان القمر الصناعي بحال شي نجمه دايزا فالسما. غادي يمشي القمر الصناعي بسرعة 12.8 كيلومطر فالثانية و هي سرعة كافيا باش تمشي من سان فرانسيسكو ل لوس أنجلوس فدقيه وحدا غادي تجيب ستاردست رقم القياسي جديد لي عمرو كان حيتاش هي أسرع مركبة فضائية لي كترجع للأرض، و لي حطمات الرقم القياسي المرة لي فاتت فشهر خمسة عام 1969 ملي رجعات الوحدة ديال القياس ابولو اكس. قال توم دوكسبري، مدير مشروع ستاردست: ""غادي تتحرك فوق الساحل الغربي لشمال كاليفورنيا وغاتضوي السما من كاليفورنيا على ولاية أوريغون الوسطى وعلى نيفادا وأيداهو وتوصل حال يوتا""."
mt: "The spacecraft will enter the atmosphere and the atmosphere at about 5 a.m. Eastern time, we will give a brief presentation to the people of Northern California and Oregon and Nevada and Utah. The spacecraft will appear as a star that is falling in the sky. The spacecraft will move at a speed of 12.8 kilometers per second, which is fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a single day. It will take the Stardust record-breaking new unit that we have created, which is the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, and broke the record last year in May 1969 when the unit of measurement returned to Apollo X. Tom Doxberry, director of the Stardust project, said: ""It will move over the west coast of Northern California and the sky from California to the central state of Oregon and Nevada and Idaho and will reach Utah."""
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: "فاش غادي يدخل القمر الصناعي للأرض و الغلاف الجوي تقريبا معا الخمسة ديال الصباح على حساب التوقيت الشرقي، باينا غادي يقدمو واحد العرض خفيف للناس فشمال كاليفورنيا و أوريجون و نيفادا و يوتا. غادي يبان القمر الصناعي بحال شي نجمه دايزا فالسما. غادي يمشي القمر الصناعي بسرعة 12.8 كيلومطر فالثانية و هي سرعة كافيا باش تمشي من سان فرانسيسكو ل لوس أنجلوس فدقيه وحدا غادي تجيب ستاردست رقم القياسي جديد لي عمرو كان حيتاش هي أسرع مركبة فضائية لي كترجع للأرض، و لي حطمات الرقم القياسي المرة لي فاتت فشهر خمسة عام 1969 ملي رجعات الوحدة ديال القياس ابولو اكس. قال توم دوكسبري، مدير مشروع ستاردست: ""غادي تتحرك فوق الساحل الغربي لشمال كاليفورنيا وغاتضوي السما من كاليفورنيا على ولاية أوريغون الوسطى وعلى نيفادا وأيداهو وتوصل حال يوتا""."
mt: "The spacecraft will enter the atmosphere and the atmosphere at about 5 a.m. Eastern time, we will give a brief presentation to the people of Northern California and Oregon and Nevada and Utah. The spacecraft will appear as a star that is falling in the sky. The spacecraft will move at a speed of 12.8 kilometers per second, which is fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in a single day. It will take the Stardust record-breaking new unit that we have created, which is the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, and broke the record last year in May 1969 when the unit of measurement returned to Apollo X. Tom Doxberry, director of the Stardust project, said: ""It will move over the west coast of Northern California and the sky from California to the central state of Oregon and Nevada and Idaho and will reach Utah."""
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: وعلى حسب السلطات ف أوهايو واحد الطبيبةً اللي كتن خدمات ف سبيطار الدراري الصغار ف بيتسبرغ ف ولاية بنسلفانيا، غادي يتهموها بجريمةِ القتل المتعمد من بعد ما لقاو أمها ميتة ف لكوفر نتا الطوموبيل ديالها نهار الأربع. لقاو الدكتور مالار بالاسوبرامانيان -29 عاماً- في بلو آش، أوهايو، وهي ضاحية بعيدة حوالي 15 ميل شمال سينسيناتي طايحة على الأرض حدا الطريق ولابسة قميص وملابس داخلية وفي حالة صعيبة تحت تأثير الدوا وقيلا. دات الضباط لمخبأ أولدزموبيل لكحل اللي بعيد ب 500 قدم. هنا لقاو لجثة نتاع ساروجا بالاسوبرامانيان، عمرو 53 سنة، مغطية بكوايش فيهم طبايع دالدم. قالو لبوليس أن الجثة كانت تما تقريبا نهار كامل.
mt: 29-year-old doctor Malarswamy Balasubramanian was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, lying on the ground near the road wearing a shirt and underwear and in a distressed state under the influence of drugs and unconscious. Police found an Oldsmobile sedan about 500 feet away. Here they found the body of Saroj Balasubramanian, 53, covered with a blanket and with signs of blood. Police said the body was found about 24 hours after the disappearance.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: هاذ هي عملية الاستحواذ الأكبر في تاريخ إيباي. كتمنى الشركة باش تنوع مصاد الدخل ديالها و تولي معروفا فالبلايص لي محتلا فيها سكايب السوق، بحال الشينوا و أوروبا و البرازيل
mt: This is the largest acquisition in eBay's history. I hope the company will diversify its revenue streams and become well known in the markets where Skype is dominant, such as China, Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: فاش حبسات المقاتْله من بعد ما نقلو الجرحى للسبيطار، شي 44 من المحابسِيا رفضو يدخلو لَزّنزانات ديالهم و بقاو فالساحة. حاولو المفاوضين أنهم يصححو الوضعية، ولكن طلبات المسجونين مواضحاش. ما بين الساعة 10:00 إلى 11:00 مساءً بتوقيت الجبل، شعلوا المساجن العافية في الساحة. دخلو الضباط للساحا ديال الحبس بزربا هازين معاهوم الماتريال ديال مكافحة الشغب و هوما يحاصرو المحابسيا بالغاز لي كيعمي فالعينين. طفاو الناس ديال الإنقاذ العافية في التالي في الساعة 11:35 بالليل.
mt: 44 of the prisoners refused to enter their cells and remained in the yard. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the demands of the prisoners were clear. Between 10:00 and 11:00 pm local time, the prisoners set fire to the prison yard. The officers entered the prison yard with riot gear and tear gas, which blinded the prisoners. At 11:35 pm, the fire was extinguished.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "هاد التصريحات لي مباشره فالتلفازا، كانو أول مرا لي غادي يعترفو فيها مصادر إيرانية لي كبيرا بلي العقوبات غادي يكون عندها ثأثير. كتشمل قيود مالية وحظر من جهة الإتحاد الأوروبي على تصدير النفط الخام, اللي الإقتصاد الإيراني كيدخل منو تْمانين فالمئة 80% من الدخل الأجنبي. قالت منظمة أوبك في تقريرها الشهري الجديد باللي صادرات النفط الخام تراجعت إلى أقل مستوى لها من عشرين عام ووصلات إلى 2.8 مليون برميل يومياً. المرشد الأعلى ديال البلاد اية الله علي خامنئي قال بلي الإعتماد على البترول غير ""قالب"" والي كيرجع التاريخ ديالو لما قبل الثورة الإسلامية الإيرانية عام 1979 والي خاص البلاد تحرر راسها منو."
mt: "These statements were made directly on television, were the first to admit Iranian sources of a large that sanctions will have an impact. It includes financial restrictions and a ban from the European Union on the export of crude oil, which the Iranian economy enters from 80% of foreign income. The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) in its monthly report said that oil exports fell to their lowest level in 20 years and reached 2.8 million barrels per day. Supreme Leader of the country Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said that the dependence on oil is not a "template" and which returns its history before the Islamic Revolution of Iran in 1979, which the country must free its head from."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: في فرنسا، كان التصويت بشكل تقليدي عبارة على تجربة بتكنولوجيا منخفضة: حيث كيعزل الناخبين براسهم في كشك، وحاطين ورقة مطبوعة بشكل مسبق كتشير للمرشحهم المفضل في جوا. من بعد ما كيتحققوا المسؤولين من الهوية ديال الناخب، كيحط الناخب البرية في الصندوق، وكيسني على القائمة ديال المصوتين. القانون الانتخابي ديال فرنسا مزير بزاف في تقنين الإجراءات. من سنة 1988 ولاو صناديق الاقتراع شفافين باش الناخبين والمراقبين يقدرو يشوفو أنه مكاينش شي بريات فالصندوق فالبدية نتاع التصويت وماتزادوش من بعد من غير دوك اللي حطوهوم الناس اللي صوتو أو عندهم الحق. كيمكن للمرشحين يصيفطوا ممثلين باش يشهدوا على كل جزء من العملية. وف الليل، كيحسبوا المتطوعين الأصوات تحت إشراف مكثف وإجراءات محددة.
mt: In France, the vote was traditionally a low-tech affair: voters cast their ballots by hand in a booth, and placed a pre-printed paper ballot in a box. After the officials verified the voter's identity, the voter placed the ballot in the box and signed the list of voters. The electoral law of France is complex in regulating the procedures. Since 1988, the ballot boxes have been transparent so that voters and observers can see that there are no ballots in the box at the beginning of the voting and none are added after the voters have cast their ballots or have the right to vote. Candidates can send representatives to witness each part of the process. At night, the volunteers count the votes under strict supervision and specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: في حالة التأكد، هاذ الاكتشاف قد يُكمل بحث آلان عن الموساشي اللي دام 8 سنوات. على حسب القياس ديال الأعماق لقاو الحطام بواسطة واحد المركبة كيتحكموا فيها على بعد. واحد من أغنياء العالم، ألان استثمر الثروة ديالو فالاستكشاف البحري وبدا البحث ديالو باش يلقى موساشي بعيد على الاهتمام بحياة الحرب.
mt: If confirmed, this discovery may complete Alan's search for the missing eight years. According to the depth measurements found by a remotely operated vehicle. One of the world's richest men, Alan invested his fortune in maritime exploration and began his search to find the missing Moshashi far from the war's attention.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: شي تقارير فالتلفازا كتبين دخان بيض خارج من لوزين. السلطات المحلية كتحذر الناس اللي ساكنين حدا المعمل أنهم يبقاو فديورهم ويطفيو المكيفات وميشربوش الما دروبيني. على حسب الوكالة النّوويّة اليابانية، قدروا يلقاو سيزيوم مشعّ وأيودين في المحطّة. وكتتوقع السلطات أن هاذشي كيشير إلى أن الحاويات اللي فيها وقود اليورانيوم في الموقع يمكن تكون تفجرت وتسربت.
mt: Reports on television showed white smoke coming from the building. Local authorities warned residents living near the plant to stay indoors and turn off air conditioning and drinking water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, they found cesium and iodine in the site. Authorities expect this to indicate that the containers containing uranium fuel in the site may have exploded and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

According to the Japanese nuclear agency, they found cesium and iodine in the site. Authorities expect this to indicate that the containers containing uranium fuel in the site may have exploded and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "اكتشفَ د. توني مول مرضَ السّل شديد المقاومةِ للدوا أو اللي كيتسمى ب (XDR-TB) في منطقةِ كوازولوناتال في جنوب إفريقيا. وقال في مقابلة أن شكل البكتيريا المتغير الجديد ""مثير للقلق ومروّع للغاية بسبب معدل الوفيات اللي زايد بزاف."" ممكن أن شي مرضى قاستهوم الحشرة، وكيعتاقد الدكتور مول أن جوج على الأقل خدامين فالسبيطار. خلال عام واحد، يقدر الواحد المُصاب يعدي ما بين 10 حتى لـ 15 من المختلطين االقراب ليه. مع ذلك، النسبة المئوية ديال مرض السلّ شديد المقاومة للدوا في إجمالي مجموعة اللي عندهم السلّ ما زال مُنخفضة؛ حيث كيتصاب 6000 من إجمالي 330000 واحد في أي لحظة محددة بجنوب إفريقيا."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered a new, highly resistant form of tuberculosis in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa. He said in an interview that the new bacteria shape is ""very alarming and frightening because of the high mortality rate."" It is possible that at least one patient was infected, and the doctor believes that at least two health workers were infected in one year. However, the percentage of highly resistant tuberculosis in the total group of people with tuberculosis is still low; where 6000 of the total 330000 people are infected at any given time in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: قالت إدارة الطيران الفيديرالية أن NextGen هو نظام اللي غادي يخلي الطائرات تطير مسافة قصيرة وتوفر ملايين الغالونات ديال الوقود كل عام وغادي تحبس انبعاث الكاربون. كتستعمل تقنية مرتبطة بالأقمار الاصطناعية ماشي بحال التقنية القديمة اللي كتستعمل رادار أرضي باش تسمح للمراقبين الجويين يحددو لبلاصة ديال الطيارة بدقة أعلى وتعطي للطيارين معلومات محددة أكثر.
mt: The Federal Aviation Administration said NextGen is a system that will allow planes to fly shorter distances and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and will reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the old ground-based radar to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint a plane's location more accurately and give pilots more precise information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: انتقد المؤرخون السياسات ديال مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي اللي فاتالي فاتت على ود كان كيركز الموارد دياله على القضايا السهلة ، وخاصة حالات الطوموبيلات المسروقة، باش يهز المعدل ديال نجاح المكتب. الكونجرس بدا التمويل ديال مبادرة الفحش في السنة المالية 2005 وحدد أن مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي خاصه يخصص 10 عملاء للمواد الإباحية للبالغين.
mt: Historians have criticized the Federal Bureau of Investigation's policies that were fatal to the agency's success, focusing its resources on easy cases, especially stolen car cases. Congress began funding the initiative in the fiscal year 2005 and mandated that the Federal Bureau of Investigation allocate 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: تزادحات االطيارة جاس 39C غريبن مع واحد الطريق وتفركعات مع 9:30 دصباح فالتوقيت المحلي (0230 UTC) وتسد المطار على الطيارات الاقتصادية. تعرف أن لبيلوط هو لقائد نتاع سكوتدرون ديلوكريت باتافي. نقلات وسائل الإعلام المحلية أن سيارة إطفاء تابعة للمطار تقلبات فاش استجبات لشي نداء.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) and closed the airport to commercial flights. It was reported that the pilot was Scott Drury of the Lockheed Martin F-35C. Local media reported that a fire truck belonging to the airport was responding to a call.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: - ناس الجمباز ديال مريكان و اللجنة الأولمبية و الباراألمبية عندهم نفس الهدف و لي هو يخليو الرياضة ديال الجمباز و غِيرْها فواحد الظروف آمنة قدر الإمكان للرياضيين باش يحققو الأحلام ديالهم فواحد البيئة آمنة و إيجابية. وف الترشيحات ديال عام 1976، خدم مستشار ديال كارتر بالنسبة للسياسة الخارجية، ومن بعد خدم مستشار ديال الأمن القومي من عام 1977 حتى لعام 1981 فعوض هنري كيسنجر. ومنين كان خدام مستشار في الأمن القومي، عاون كارتر دبلوماسيًا على إدارة الشؤون العالمية بحال اتفاقيات كامب ديفيد عام 1978؛ وفكرة تطبيع العلاقات الأمريكية والصينية في التالي ديال السبعينيات؛ والثورة الإيرانية اللي تسببات في الكارثة ديال الرهائن الإيرانية عام 1979؛ والغزو السوفييتي لأفغانستان عام 1979.
mt: - The United States Olympic Committee and the International Olympic Committee have the same goal and that is to make the sport of gymnastics and other sports in a safe environment for the athletes to achieve their dreams in a positive and safe environment. In the nominations of 1976, Carter's foreign policy adviser served as a foreign policy adviser, and after serving as a national security adviser from 1977 to 1981 instead of Henry Kissinger. And while working as a national security adviser, Carter helped diplomatically manage global affairs such as the Camp David Accords of 1978; the idea of normalizing US-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian revolution that led to the Iranian hostage crisis of 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: بوبيك تولد في العاصمة الكرواتية زغرب، واتشهر منين لعب مع بارتيزان بلغراد. دخل معاهم في عام 1945 وبقى حتى لعام 1958. فهاذ الفترة اللي دوزها مع الفريق، سجل 403 هدف في 468 مباراة. حتا واحد مكان باين ولا مركا بيوت للنادي أكثر من بوبك. سنة 1995 تختار كأفضل لاعب في تاريخ البارتيزان.
mt: Born in the Croatian capital Zagreb, he became known for playing with Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During this period he scored 403 goals in 468 games. One place is still the club's top scorer, ahead of Bobek. In 1995 he was chosen as the best player in the history of Partizan.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "هيسبيرونيكوس إليزابيث هو نوع من عائلة ديناصورات الدرومايوصوريات وولد عم ديناصور فيلوسيرابتور. كيقولو أن هاد الطائر الجارح اللي دمُّو سخون أو كلُّو ريش, تيزعموا أنّهُ كان تيمشي على رجليه واقف, أو عندو مخالب فحال فيلوسيرابتور. المخلب دياله الثاني كان أكبر، وبسببه اتسمى الديناصور هيسبيرونيكس واللي كيعني ""المخلب الغربي."""
mt: "Hesperonis elizabethae is a species of dinosaur in the family Dromaeosauridae and the closest relative of Velociraptor. It is said to have been a carnivorous bird with feathers, that walked on its legs upright, or had claws like Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, and because of this the dinosaur was named Hesperonis, meaning "western claw.""
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: الحفلة حضر فيها على الأقل شي 100 واحد باش يحتفلوا بالذكرى السنوية الأولى ديال راجل ومراته تزوجوا العام اللي فات. وقال المسؤولين باللي راهم حددوا شي موعد رسمي باش يحتفلوا بالذكرى السنوية من بعد. تزوجو في تكساس هادي عام و جاو لبافالو باش يحتفالو مع لأقارب ديالهم. الزوج اللي عندو 30 عام تزاد فبافالو هو واحد من اربعة اللي قتلو في اطلاق النار، لكن الزوجة متقاستش.
mt: 100 people attended the party to celebrate the first anniversary of the couple's marriage. Officials have set a formal date to celebrate the anniversary. They married in Texas last year and came to Phoenix to celebrate with family. The 30-year-old groom was one of four people killed in a shooting, but the bride was unharmed.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.
