src: كانت لونو هازة 120–160 متر مكعب نتاع لفيول فاش تهرسات ودفعها الريح ولمواج للحاجز دلمواج. الهليكوبترات قدرت توصل لأفراد الطاقم الثناش والجرحى كان غير واحد منخاره مهرس. الطول دالبابور هو 100 متر في طريقو باش يجمع شحنات السماد و فالاول خافو المسئولين ان البابور يطيح الحمولة.
mt: 120–160 cubic metres of fuel spilled from a ruptured pipeline, which was blown over by the wind and washed into a barrier. Helicopters were able to reach the two-man crew and the injured, who was not seriously hurt. The pipeline is 100 metres long and was carrying fertiliser, and the authorities feared the pipeline would topple the load.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: مَن بين الإنجازات لّي دار فوتير مَن غِير القيادة هو الإضراب عن الطعام عام 1973 ضَّد الرقابة السياسية. القانون الفرنساوي تبدل. بدا النشاط دياله السياسي وهو عنده 15 العام منين دخل في المقاومة الفرنسية في الحرب العالمية الثانية. وثّق راسه في كتاب ديال عام 1998. رجع في الستينيات للجزائر اللي كانت يالاه استقلات باش يقري الإخراج السينمائي.
mt: Among his achievements, he is best known for his hunger strike in 1973 against political censorship. The French law changed. He began his political activism at the age of 15, joining the French Resistance during World War II. He documented his life in a book published in 1998. He returned to Algeria in the 1960s to help with the country's independence.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: مشاو مليون من الناس ديالنا باش يحضرو الدفن. الناس اللي جاو كانو كتار لدرجة مقدرش كلشي يدخل للدفن فالساحة نتاع سانت بيتر. بزاف دالشاشات لكبيرة تدارت فبلايص مختلفة فروما باش الناس يتفرجو فالاحتفال. في بزاف ديال المدن الأخرى الإيطالية وفي بقية أنحاء العالم، وخاصة في بولندا، داروا تجهيزات بحالها والي شافوها بزاف ديال الناس.
mt: 1 million people attended the funeral. People were so crowded that not everyone could enter the square in St. Peter. Several large screens were set up in different places so that people could watch the ceremony. In several other Italian cities and in other parts of the world, especially in Poland, similar arrangements were made, and many people saw it.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: على حسب التقارير، واحد البرطمة في شارع ماكبث تفركعات بسباب تسرب الغاز. وصل واحد المسؤول في شركة الغاز للبلاصة ديال الحادثة من بعد ما بلغ واحد الجار على تسرب الغاز. مْعا وْصل المسؤول، تفركعات (انفاجْرات) البارطما. مكاين حتا شي تقرير على إصابات، ولكن خمسة دالأشخاص على الأقل تلقاو عناية لمعالجة أعراض مابعد الصدمة من بعد الانفجار. تا واحد ماكان داخل الشقة. في ذاك الوقت، تقريبا شي 100 مواطن دارو لهم الإخلاء من المنطقة.
mt: According to reports, a gas leak in Macbeth Street caused an explosion.  A gas company official arrived at the scene after a neighbor reported a gas leak.  The official arrived, the explosion occurred (detonation).  There were no reports of injuries, but at least five people were treated for shock symptoms after the blast.  No one was inside the apartment.  At the time, about 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: نيكولاس ألدين، 25 عام، و زاكاري كودباك، 21 عام، هوما اللي ماتو. كودباك كان سايق. تقاس إدغار فيجويلا بجروح ف الدراع والفك فلوقت اللي كريستوفر شنايدر كان محتاج لجراحة ترميمية لوجهو. السلاح ديال أوكا خسر فاش نيّش على راس الرّاجل الخامس. شنايدر عندو ألم مستمَر و واحد العين مكايشوفش بيها و طاير ليه واحد الطرف من الجمجمة و وجهو مصايبو من التيتانيوم. قدم شنايدر الشهادة ديالو بواحد الرابط دلفيديو من واحد لاباز (قاعدة) تابعة للقوات الجوية الأمريكية فبلادو.
mt: 25-year-old Nicolas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cudnik were killed. Cudnik was the pilot. Edgar Figueroa was injured in the arm and jaw at the time Christopher Schneider needed reconstructive surgery on his face. The gun of the Oka lost when it hit the head of the fifth man. Schneider has persistent pain and one eye does not see with it and a part of the skull is flying to him. Schneider gave his testimony with a video link from a US Air Force base in Placido.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: المفروض يرجع الجولف والرجبي للألعاب الأولمبية. صوتات اللجنة العالمية للألعاب الأولمبية باش يدخلو الرياضات فالاجتماع التنفيذي اللي تدار فبرلين اليوم. تختار الريعبي والغولف على خمسة دالرياضات أخرين باش يقدرو يشاركو فالألعاب الأولمبية. السكواش والكاراتي والكرة الدوارة البيسبول والكرة اللينة، كلهم حاولو باش يدخلو للبروغرام الأولمبي و اللي صوتو عليهم خارج الألعاب الأولمبية فسنة 2005. باقي خاص المصادقة على التصويت من طرف اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية الكاملة في الإجتماع ديالها في أكتوبر في كوبنهاغن/ Copenhagen.
mt: Golf and rugby are expected to return to the Olympic Games. Votes of the International Olympic Committee to be held in Berlin today. Choose rugby and golf on five other sports to be able to participate in the Olympic Games. Squash, karate, baseball, softball, all tried to enter the Olympic program and voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The rest of the approval of the vote by the full International Olympic Committee in its meeting in October in Copenhagen / Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: ف24 سبتمبر 1759، وقع آرثر غينيس عقد استأجار مدة ديالو 9000 سنة لصالح شركة سينت جيمس كيت بيوري فدبلن، فإيرلاندا. ومن بعد ما دازت 250 عام، ولات غينيس شركةً عالميةً كتربح أكثر من 10 مليار ديال الأورو (تقريبا 14.7 مليار دولار أمريكي كل عام.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease with the St. James's Brewery Company in Dublin, Ireland. After 250 years, Guinness became a global brand, earning more than €10 billion (approximately $14.7 billion) each year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: تأكدات واحد لحالة نتاع إنفلوانزا الطيور اللي كتقتل الإنسان، H5N1، أنها قتلات واد لبط بري، تلقا نهار تنين فمارشلاند حدا ليون جيهت شرق دفرنسا. فرنسا هي الدولة السابعة في الاتحاد الأوروبي اللي كتعاني من هاذ الفيروس؛ من بعد النمسا وألمانيا وسلوفينيا وبلغاريا واليونان وإيطاليا. الحالات لي شاكين فيهم بلي مراض بفيروس H5N1 فكرواتيا مزال ممتأكدين منهم
mt: A case of H5N1, the bird flu virus that can kill humans, was confirmed in a wild duck found on Tuesday in the Marne department near Lyon in eastern France. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus; after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Cases suspected of being infected with H5N1 in Croatia are still unconfirmed
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: لامو القوات ديال حفظ السلام لّي تابْعه للامم المتحدة، و لّي وصلو لهايتي من بعدما ضرب الزَّلزال عام 2010، حيتاش انتشر المرض من حدا المعسكر ديالهم. على حسب الدعوى القضائية، نفايات معسكر الأمم المتّحدة ما تعقماتش مزيان، هاذشي خلا البكتيريا تتسلل لرافد الواد ديال أرتيبونايت، وهو من أكبر الويدان ف هايتي. من قبل ميجيو العسكر ماعمر هايتي عانات من مشاكل متعلقة بالمرض من سنوات 1800. شاركات مؤسسة هايتي للعدالة والديموقراطية شي أبحاث مستقلة اللي كتقول أن لباطايون نتاع الأمم النيبالي المتحدة لحفظ السلام جاب المرض لهايتي بطريقة ممعروفاش. صرحت دانييلا لانتين، إحدى خبراء المرض التابعين للأمم المتحدة أنه يمكن يكون سبب تفشي المرض هو قوات حفظ السلام.
mt: The United Nations peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, spread the disease from their camp. According to the lawsuit, the UN peacekeepers' waste was not properly treated, allowing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Before the UN peacekeepers arrived, Haiti had not had health problems related to disease for centuries. The independent research conducted by the Haiti Justice and Democracy Foundation says that the UN peacekeepers brought the disease to Haiti in a known way. Danielle Lantin, one of the disease experts affiliated with the United Nations, said that the spread of the disease could be due to the UN peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "كتوكد الحكومة الإيرلاندية على استعجالية التشريع البرلماني باش يصحح الوضعية. قال المتحدث باسم الحكومة: ""من المهم دابا سواءً من منظور الصّحة العامّة أو من منظور العدالة الجنائية أنه يدوز التّشريع في أسرع وقت ممكنٍ."" بين وزير الصحة لقلق ديالو من الناس اللي تيستعملو ديك المواد بشكل قانوني مؤقتا، وحتى الإدانات اللي عندها علاقة بالمخدرات واللي جات من لوقيتة اللي تطبقات فيها التغييرات اللي معندهاش علاقة بالدستور."
mt: "The Irish government is working to expedite parliamentary legislation to correct the situation. The government spokesman said: "It is important now, both from a public health perspective and from a criminal justice perspective, that legislation is brought forward as quickly as possible." The health minister expressed concern about people who use the substances legally, and those convicted of drug-related offences who were sentenced under the old laws that are no longer in line with the constitution."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "كتوكد الحكومة الإيرلاندية على استعجالية التشريع البرلماني باش يصحح الوضعية. قال المتحدث باسم الحكومة: ""من المهم دابا سواءً من منظور الصّحة العامّة أو من منظور العدالة الجنائية أنه يدوز التّشريع في أسرع وقت ممكنٍ."" بين وزير الصحة لقلق ديالو من الناس اللي تيستعملو ديك المواد بشكل قانوني مؤقتا، وحتى الإدانات اللي عندها علاقة بالمخدرات واللي جات من لوقيتة اللي تطبقات فيها التغييرات اللي معندهاش علاقة بالدستور."
mt: "The Irish government is working to expedite parliamentary legislation to correct the situation. The government spokesman said: "It is important now, both from a public health perspective and from a criminal justice perspective, that legislation is brought forward as quickly as possible." The health minister expressed concern about people who use the substances legally, and those convicted of drug-related offences who were sentenced under the old laws that are no longer in line with the constitution."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "قال كريستوفر غارسيا -المتحدّث باسم قسم بوليس مدينة لوس أنجلوس- إنّ الجّاني الذّكر المشتبه به راه كيخضع للتحقيق بتهمة التعدّي على ممتلكات الغيْر فبلاصة التخريب. متدمرش الرمز، داكشي اللي تبدل تدار غير بتواب مشعشعينومزوقين برموز نتاع بيس أن لوف باش يبدل ""O"" وتقرا ""e"" صغيرة."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect, who is being questioned on suspicion of vandalism, is accused of defacing property with spray paint. The symbol, which replaces the letter "O" with a small "e," is believed to be a reference to the "Off" brand of deodorant."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: "كارنو هو أستاذ إندليزية معروف ولكن خالق جدل حيت درس فالنظام التعليمي المعاصر ووقت مجد الملك واللي قال أنه درس 9000 طالب فمجد المسيرة المهنية ديالو. استخدم في الملاحظات ديالو شي كلمات اعتبرها شي آباء حشومة، وتقال إنه خصر الهضرة فالقسم. اتهمو النظام التعليمي المعاصر بأنه طبع إشهارات كبيرة على الحافلات بدون رخصة وكذب فاش قال أنه رئيسي مدرسي اللغة الإنجليزية. واتهموه من قبل باللي خرق حقوق الملكية، ولكن ماتحكمش عليه. قال واحد الطالب السابق بالي راه كان كيهضر بالدارجة في القسم، وعلمهم كيفاش يديرو الرنديفويات في الملاحظات، وكان مصاحب مع الطلبة""."
mt: "Carno is a well-known English teacher but controversial for teaching in the modern educational system at the time of the King's reign, who said he taught 9000 students in his career. He used in his notes some words considered by some parents to be vulgar, and was said to have been expelled from the class. The modern educational system was accused of printing large advertisements on buses without a license and lying when he said he was the head of the English department. He was accused by some of copyright infringement, but was not convicted. A former student said he spoke in the vernacular in the class, and taught them how to do the randivoyants in the notes, and was accompanied by students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: واحد اليوليسي فلبيني قديم احتجز سياح من هونج كونج رهائن منين خطف الكار ديالهم في مانيلا، عاصمة الفلبين. ضرب رولاندو ميندوزا السياح بالبندقية M16 ديالو. تعتقو شوية دالرهائن وستة على الأقل ماتو لحد الساعة. ستة دالرهائن بما فيهم الدراري الصغار والناس لكبار تطلقو بكري وحتى المصورين الفليبينيين. خداو لمصوين لبلاصة نتاع واحد لعكوزة ملي مشات لطواليط. تحرك لقرطاص فميندوزا.
mt: A former Philippine police officer has taken tourists from Hong Kong hostage in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Roland Mendosa shot the tourists with his M16 rifle. Several hostages have been released and at least six are dead so far. The hostages, including children and elderly people, have been released and the Filipino journalists. The journalists were taken to a balcony when they went to the toilet. Mendosa moved to Caracas.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: البرازيل هي أكبر دولة كاثوليكية رومانية على وجه الأرض، والكنيسة الكاثوليكية الرومانية دايما كانت كتعارض السماح بالزواج ديال المثليين في البلاد. كان المجلس الوطني البرازيلي تيناقش التقنين لمدة 10 سنين، والزواج المدني قانوني دابا غير ف ريو غراندي دو سول. لعمدة اللي كان قبل نتاع ساو باولو، مارتا سوبليسي، هو اللي كان حاط مشروع لقانون الأصلي. ومن مورا تعديل لمشروع ولا روبيرتو جيفيرسون مسؤول عليه. المتظاهرين باغيين يجمعو عارضة فيها 1.2 مليون توقيع باش يقدموها للمجلس الوكني فنوفمبر.
mt: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country in the world, and the Roman Catholic Church has always opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The Brazilian National Council discussed the decriminalization of homosexuality for 10 years, and civil marriage is now legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The previous mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy, was the one who put the original project into law. After the amendment of the project, the politician Roberto Jefferson is responsible for it. Protesters wanted to collect 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Council in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "بدات الريح كتدخل من بعد خمسة ديال الدقائق من فاش بدا العرض، ومن بعد دقيقة وصلت السرعة ديال الرياح لـ 70 كم في الساعة... ومن بعد طاحت الشتا، ولكن صعيبة ومجهدة لدرجة أنها كتلفح الجلد ديالك بحال الإبرة، ومن بعد طاح الثلج من السماء، والناس خافت وبدات تغوت وخرجوا كيجريو فوق بعضياتهم. قال أرماند فرساتشي:"" مشات أختي وصاحبتها، وفي طريقي كان كاين جوج ديال الناس جالسين على كرسي متحرك، وكان الناس كينقزوا ويدفعوهم."
mt: "The wind started to come in after five minutes of the show starting, and after a minute the wind speed reached 70 km/h... and then it started to snow, but it was so hard and exhausting that it pierced your skin like needles, and then the snow started to fall from the sky, and people were scared and started to run over each other. Armand Frascati said: "My sister and her friend left, and on my way there were two people sitting on a wheelchair, and people were pushing them."
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: تيقولو صحاب لأرصاد الجوية أن لعاصفة اللي بعيدة بشي 645 ميل (1040 كيلومت) من جيهت غرب جزر كاب فيردي تقد تلاشى قبل متوصل حتى شي أرض. دابا السرعة ديال الريح ديال إعصار فريد وصت حاليا لـ 105 ميل في الساعة (165 كم/ساعة) وراه غادي جهة الشمال الغربي. فريد هو أقوى إعصار استوائي تسجل حتى لدابا في جنوب وشرق المحيط الأطلسي منين ظهرات صور الأقمار الاصطناعية، وهو بوحده ثالث أكبر إعصار تسجل في الشرق بزاوية 35 درجة من الغرب.
mt: The National Hurricane Center said the storm, which was about 645 miles (1,040 kilometers) west of the Cape Verde Islands, was expected to dissipate before reaching land. The storm's winds were clocked at 105 mph (165 kph) and moving north-northwest. Fred was the strongest Atlantic hurricane ever recorded south and east of the Atlantic Ocean, and the third strongest east of the Caribbean at 35 degrees west.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: المعيار ديال 802.11n كيخدّم التردد 2.4 جيغا هيرتز و 5.0 جيغا هيرتز. هادشي غادي يسمح باش تكون متوافقة مع المعايير (تَمْنَمْية أو زوج. حْداش a )802.11a و (تَمْنَمْية أو زوج. حْداش b)802.11b و (تَمْنَمْية أو زوج. حْداش g)802.11g ، بشرط تكون المحطة الأساسية عندها زوج راديوات. السرعات د 802.11n تيكونو أسرع من دوك اللي سابقينها بإنتاجية نظرية قصوى نتاع 600 ميغابايت فالثانية.
mt: 802.11n standard uses the 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz frequencies. This will allow compatibility with the 802.11a and 802.11b and 802.11g standards, provided the base station has dual radios. 802.11n speeds are faster than its predecessors with a theoretical maximum throughput of 600 megabits per second.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: لاطليت لأولمبي كان خاصو يضر 100 متر و200 متر سباحة حرة فتلاتة نتاع لمراحل باش يربح ميدالية ذهبية فألعاب الكومونويلث، ولكن نظرا للشكاوي كان شك فلبنية لبدنية ديالو. مقدرش ياكل الدوا الي خاصه باش ميبقاش حاس بالوجع لحقاش ممنوع في الألعاب.
mt: 100m and 200m freestyle swimmer was expected to win gold in the Commonwealth Games, but was disqualified due to a doping violation. He was unable to take the banned drug due to a stomach illness.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: بينات خريطة الزلازل الدولية للمسح الجيولوجي فالولايات المتحدة أنه ما كانش زلازل في أيسلندا فالأسبوع اللي فات. مقالش مكتب الأرصاد الجوية الإيرلاندي أنه كاين شي نشاط دزلزال فمنطقة هيلكا ف 48 ساعة اللي دازت. وقع زلزال قاسح اللي نتج عليه تغيير لمرحلة ف 10 مارس من جيهت الشمال الشرقي نتاع لقمة نتاع بركان كاليدرا. تسجلات شي سحب مظلمة ممرتبطاش بشي أنشطة بركانية ف قاعدة الجبل. السحابات بينات قدرة التشويش على واش كاين انفجار بركاني ولا لا.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's Earthquake Map shows no earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reports seismic activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. A devastating earthquake occurred on March 10 from the northeast of the peak of the volcano. There are dark clouds associated with volcanic activity at the base of the mountain. The clouds are within the ability to interfere with whether there is a volcanic eruption or not.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: بينات خريطة الزلازل الدولية للمسح الجيولوجي فالولايات المتحدة أنه ما كانش زلازل في أيسلندا فالأسبوع اللي فات. مقالش مكتب الأرصاد الجوية الإيرلاندي أنه كاين شي نشاط دزلزال فمنطقة هيلكا ف 48 ساعة اللي دازت. وقع زلزال قاسح اللي نتج عليه تغيير لمرحلة ف 10 مارس من جيهت الشمال الشرقي نتاع لقمة نتاع بركان كاليدرا. تسجلات شي سحب مظلمة ممرتبطاش بشي أنشطة بركانية ف قاعدة الجبل. السحابات بينات قدرة التشويش على واش كاين انفجار بركاني ولا لا.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's Earthquake Map shows no earthquakes in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reports seismic activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. A devastating earthquake occurred on March 10 from the northeast of the peak of the volcano. There are dark clouds associated with volcanic activity at the base of the mountain. The clouds are within the ability to interfere with whether there is a volcanic eruption or not.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: طلقات المركبة المدارية القمرية اللي ما عندهاش طيار Chandrayaan-1 مسبار تأثير القمر (MIP) ، أو اللي انطلق عبر سطح القمر بسرعة 1.5واحد فاصلة خمسة كيلومتر في الثانية (تلتلاف/3000 ميل فالساعة) ، ونجح فالهبوط قريب من القطب الجنوبي للقمر. فوق انه هاز ثلاثة ديال الأدوات العلمية المهمة، المسبار القمري هز كذلك صورة العلم الوطني الهندي مرسومة من جميع الجهات.
mt: The lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 spacecraft, which has no pilot, fired its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), or impacted the lunar surface at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 miles per hour), and landed near the lunar south pole. It carried three important scientific instruments, and also drew a picture of the Indian national flag inscribed on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: الحالات الأولى نتاع المرض دهاد الموسم تعلنو فأواخر يوليوز. المرض تيكون فالحلالف وتينتاقل للإنسان عن طريق الناموس. لنتشار دفع لحكومة لهندية تاخد شي تدابير بحال أنها تفرق مصيدات نتاع لحلالف فلبلايص لي متضرر بزاف، وتفرق آلاف ريدوات نتاع الناموس وترش لمبيدات. الحكومة واعدات بلملايين دلقراعي داللقاح ضد التهاب الدماغ والحكومة هي اللي غادي توجد واكالات صحية للسنة اللي جاية. مخططات التلقيح اللي غاتعطا للمناطق الأكثر تأثرا تاريخيا هاد السنة تأجلات بسبب نقص التمويل وضعف الأولوية مقارنة مع أمراض أخرى.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were announced in late July. The disease is spread from deer to humans through ticks. The spread of the disease prompted the Indian government to take measures such as banning hunting in areas affected by the disease, and releasing thousands of deer and spraying pesticides. The government promised millions of doses of the vaccine against encephalitis and the government is the one that will provide health clinics next year. The vaccination plans that were given to the most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funding and lower priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: التعديل المقترح كان داز فلغرف بجوج ف 2011. دارو تغيير في هاذ الجلسة التشريعية منين حيدو الجملة الثانية ف الأول ف مجلس النواب ومن بعد صوت عليها مجلس الشيوخ بنفس الشكل نهار الاثنين. لفشل نتاع الحكم الثاني اللي كيقتارح تجريم الاتحادات المدنية نتاع نفس الجنس يقدر يفتح الباب لاتحادات مدنية فالمستقبل. من بعد هاذ العملية، الهيئة التشريعية المنتخبة اللي جاية إما في 2015 أو 2016 غادي تراجع HJR-3 مرة أخرى باش يبقاو في العملية.
mt: 2011 proposed amendment was removed from the Google search. The first sentence was removed from the House of Representatives and then voted on the Senate in the same form on Monday. The failure of the second vote to ban same-sex unions can open the door to civil unions in the future. After this process, the elected body in 2015 or 2016 will review HJR-3 again to remain in the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: """أوراق بناما"" هو مصطلح تيرجع على المليون وثيقة اللي سربتها شركة المحامات موساك فونسيكا للصحافة فالربيع د2016. بينو الوثائق أن14 د البنكات عاونات ناس مرفحين على أنهم يخبعو ثروة دملايير الدولارات باش يتهربو من الضرائب وشي إجراءات أخرين. قالت صحيفة الجارديان البريطانية أن ""بنك دويتشه"" كيتحكم تقريبا في الثلث ديال 1200 شركة وهمية كانوا كيستخدموهم باش يديروا هاذشي. كانت حتجاجات ومحاكمات فالعالم كلو ستاقل رئيس د إيسلاندا وحتى د باكستان."
mt: """Panama Papers"" is a term referring to millions of documents leaked by the law firm Mossack Fonseca in the spring of 2016. The documents show that 14 of the world's largest banks helped wealthy clients evade taxes and other legal proceedings. The British newspaper The Guardian said that "Deutsche Bank" controls about a third of 1200 fictitious companies that were used to carry out this. There were protests and trials around the world, including the resignation of the Prime Minister of Iceland and even of Pakistan.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: شحال من حوادث جوية وقعات في إيران، لاحقاش عندها أسطول قديم وما كيديروش ليه الصيانة باش يخدم في العمليات المدنية والعسكرية. كتشمل العقوبات الدولية منع شراء طائرات جديدة. تحطمت في الاول ديال هاذ السيمانة هيليكوبتير ديال البوليس، وماتو 3 د الناس وتجرحو 3 آخرين. وقعات الشهر الفايت أسوء كارثة جوية عرفاتها إيران منذ سنوات فاش تحطمات طائرة كانت غادية لأرمينيا ماتوا فيها 168. فنفس الشهر واحد الطيارة تحةلات على طريق جيالها ف ماشهاد وضربات واحد لحيط وقتلات 17 دناس.
mt: 3 people were killed and 3 others injured when a police helicopter crashed in the first of two incidents. Last month was the worst aviation disaster to hit Iran in years when a plane bound for Armenia crashed, killing 168. In the same month a plane skidded off a runway in Mashhad and hit a house, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: قدمات مجموع دراسة العراق التقرير ديالها اليوم مع 12 بتوقيت غرينيتش. كيحذر من أنه حتى واحد ما يمكن له يضمن باللي أي مسار عمل في هاذ اللحظة في العراق غادي يوقف الحرب الطائفية أو العنف الي كيزيد أو الطريق ديال الفوضى. تيبدا تقرير بملتمس باش يتفتح النقاش وتشكيل نتاع واح لإجماع فالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية على السياسة فالشرق الأوسط. كينتاقد التقرير تقريبا كل جانب من جوانب السياسة نتاع السلطة التنفيذية اللي مطبقاها فلعراق وكيدعو لأنها تبدل التوجه ديالها دغيا. أول توصية من ال78 توصية ديالها هو أنه خاص تكون واحد المبادرة دبلوماسية من قبل ما يتسالى هاذ العام باش تتأمن حدود العراق ضد التدخلات العدوانية وتتعاود تتأسس العلاقات الدبلوماسية مع الجيران ديالها.
mt: 12:00 GMT. The report warns that no one can guarantee that any current course of action in Iraq will stop the sectarian violence or increase or the path of chaos. The report begins by calling for the opening of a dialogue and the formation of a consensus in the United States on policy in the Middle East. The report criticizes almost every aspect of the executive authority's policy in Iraq and calls for a change in direction. The first recommendation of its 78 recommendations is that there should be a diplomatic initiative by the end of this year to secure the borders of Iraq against aggressive incursions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "وعلى حسب ما قالته وكالة ""أنسا""، ""البوليس خاف من عمليات اغتيال على مستويات رفيعة، على ود هاذشي ممكن ينوض حرب على الخلافة. قالو البوليس أن لكلمة نتاع لو بيكولو هي الرقم واحد لاحقاش كان ليد ليمنى نتاع بروفنزانو ف باليرمو وبسباب الخبرة لكبيرة ديالو اللي عطاتو الاحترام نتاع الأجيال دالرؤساء اللي كبر منو واللي كانو متبعين سياسة بروفنزانو اللي كتعتامد على أنهم يحافظو على أدنى مستوى ويقويو شبكة القوة ديالهم. هادوك لي بوس كان تيحكم فيهم بروفينزانو فاش وقف لحرب نتاع رينا ضد الدولة اللي قتلات ناس دلمفيا المسيحية جيوفاني فلاكون و باولو بورسيلينو ف 1992."""
mt: "And according to the news agency Ansa, the police feared assassination attempts on high levels, and this could lead to a war of succession. The police said that the word of the people of Bari is the number one to follow, after which there was no one to be left to the people of Palermo and because of his great experience, which gave him respect to the generations of presidents who grew up and were following the policy of Provenzano, which is based on maintaining the lowest level and strengthening their network of power. These were controlled by Provenzano when he stopped the war of Rina against the state that killed the Christian people of the Mafia Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: "وعلى حسب ما قالته وكالة ""أنسا""، ""البوليس خاف من عمليات اغتيال على مستويات رفيعة، على ود هاذشي ممكن ينوض حرب على الخلافة. قالو البوليس أن لكلمة نتاع لو بيكولو هي الرقم واحد لاحقاش كان ليد ليمنى نتاع بروفنزانو ف باليرمو وبسباب الخبرة لكبيرة ديالو اللي عطاتو الاحترام نتاع الأجيال دالرؤساء اللي كبر منو واللي كانو متبعين سياسة بروفنزانو اللي كتعتامد على أنهم يحافظو على أدنى مستوى ويقويو شبكة القوة ديالهم. هادوك لي بوس كان تيحكم فيهم بروفينزانو فاش وقف لحرب نتاع رينا ضد الدولة اللي قتلات ناس دلمفيا المسيحية جيوفاني فلاكون و باولو بورسيلينو ف 1992."""
mt: "And according to the news agency Ansa, the police feared assassination attempts on high levels, and this could lead to a war of succession. The police said that the word of the people of Bari is the number one to follow, after which there was no one to be left to the people of Palermo and because of his great experience, which gave him respect to the generations of presidents who grew up and were following the policy of Provenzano, which is based on maintaining the lowest level and strengthening their network of power. These were controlled by Provenzano when he stopped the war of Rina against the state that killed the Christian people of the Mafia Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: توفى الياباني جوداكو هيتوشي سايتو على 54 سنة وهو اللي كان ربح جوج ميداليات أولمبية ذهبية. سبب لوفاة المعلن هو سرطان مجري البول مات في أوساكا نهار الثلاث. زيد على أنه بطل أولمبي وعالمي سابق، كان سايتو رئيس لجنة التدريب في اتحاد الجودو الياباني في الوقت اللي مات فيه.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Judo Hitoshi Saito died. The cause of death was bladder cancer, which he died in Osaka on Monday. In addition to being an Olympic and world champion, Saito was the chairman of the training committee of the Japanese Judo Federation at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: وفي هاذ الرحلة دياله، كانت عند إيواساكي بزاف ديال المشاكل في بزاف ديال المناسبات. كانوا سرقوه القراصنة من قبل، وهاجمه في التبت واحد االكلب مسعور، وهرب من الزواج في نيبال، وشدوه في الحبس في الهند
mt: In this trip, he had problems in several places. He was kidnapped by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, ran away from a wedding in Nepal, and was arrested in India
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: جيانكارلو فيشيلا مبقاش قادر يسيطر على الطوموبيل دياله، وخرج من السباق من بعد البداية غير بواحد الشوية. كان الزميل ديالو في الفريق فرناندو ألونسو متصر السباق، لكنه توقف مباشرةً بعد التوقف للصيانة، ربما بسبب التواء العجلة الأمامية اليمنى بجهد. كمل ميكل شوماخر السباق ديالو بمدة قليلو من بعد ألونسو، بسبب تعطل بلايص العجلات فالمواجهات العديدة فالسباق.
mt: 2006 Brazilian Grand Prix
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: "في الشهورة الثلاثة اللي دازت، خرجوا أكثر من 80 معتقلا من الحبس ديال منشأة سنترال بوكنج بلا ما يوجهوا تهم رسمية ليهم. في شهر أبريل من هاذ العام، القاضي ""غلين"" أصدر واحد الأمر تقييدي مؤقت ضد المنشأة باش يخرجوا المحتجزين اللي دازت أكثر من 24 ساعة على احتجازهم ومعطاهمش وكيل المحكمة جلسة استماع. الوكيل كيحدد الكفالة، فحالة إيلا تعطات، و كيثّبث التهم لي وجهها الظابط لي كيعتقل. ومن بعد، المستحقات كيدخلو لسيتيم ديال البيسي ديال الولاية فين كيتبعو الحالة ديالها. كتحدد جلسة الاستماع التاريخ نتاع حق المشتبه به فمحاكمة مزروبة."
mt: "In the three days that have passed, more than 80 detainees have been released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged with any crime. In April of this year, Judge Glenn issued a temporary restraining order against the facility to release detainees who had been held for more than 24 hours on their arrest. The prosecutor is required to set bail, if applicable, and to prosecute the charges filed against the officer who arrested them. After that, the charges are transferred to the state's district attorney's office, where the case is prosecuted."
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: قال لودين أن مسؤولين قررو يلغيو إعادة الاقتراع باش الأفغانيين ميعانيوش من مصاريف ومخاطر الأمن ديال انتخابات معاودين. قال دبلوماسيون بأنهم لقاوا بزاف ديال الالتباس في الدستور الأفغاني وهاذشي خلا جولة الإعادة غير ضرورية. هادشي كيتناقض مع التقارير لي كانت كتقول أن ألغاتء جولة الإعادة كان كيتعارض مع الدستور.
mt: Lodin said officials decided to cancel the runoff because Afghans were not willing to bear the costs and security risks of another election. Diplomats said they found several inconsistencies in the Afghan constitution and that a runoff was not necessary. This contradicts reports that a runoff was in conflict with the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "من لوقت اللي خدات فيه باكستان الاستقلال من الحكم دبريطانيا ف 1947 دار الرئيس الباكستاني ""عملاء سياسيين"" باش يحكمو المناطق القبلية الخاضعة للإدارة الاتحادية FATA واللي عندهم حكم ذاتي شبه كامل على هاد المناطق. هاد لعملاء مسؤولين على أنهم يقدمو خدمات حكومية وقضائية بحكم لبند 247 من الدستور نتاع باكستان."
mt: 1947, when Pakistan gained independence from British rule, President of Pakistan Zulfikar Ali Bhutto declared the Federally Administered Tribal Areas (FATA) as "political agents" to govern the semi-autonomous regions. These political agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: "الفيلم اللي فيه ريان غوسلين و إيما ستون ترشح للفوز فكاع الفئات الرئيسية. جوسلينغ وستون جاتلهم بجوج بيهم الترشيحات ديال أفضل ممثل وممثلة. الترشيحات لوخرين فيهم أحسن فيلم وأحسن إخراج وتصوير سينيمائي وتصميم ملابس وكتابة لأفلام ولموسيقى تصويرية وتصميم دلإنتاج ولكتابة دالصوت والميكساج نتاعو والسيناريو الأصلي. - خدات أغاني فيلم أوديشن و لي هما "" ذا فوولز هوو دريم"" و "" سيتي اوف ستارز"" بزاف الأصوات كأحسن أغاني أصلية. و خْدا ستوديو ليونسكابت 26 صوت كثر من أي ستوديو آخر."
mt: "The film in which Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone are nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for best actor and actress. The other nominations include best picture, best director, best cinematography, best costume design, best original screenplay, best original score, best production design, best sound editing, best sound mixing, best original song, and best original screenplay. - The songs from the film, "The Fool's Dream" and "City of Stars" were nominated for best original song. And Lionsgate's 26 nominations are more than any other studio."
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: هيئة الإذاعة اليابانية قالت أن محطة توليد الطاقة النووية Kashiwazaki Kariwa كانت خدامة بشكل عادي. مبلغاتش شركة هوكوريكو للطاقة الكهربائية عن شي آثار دالزلزال، ولكنها بلغات أن المفاعلين رقم 1 و2 في محطة شيكا للطاقة النووية تسدو. أفادت التقارير أنه يوجد في المنطقة حوالي 9400 منزل بدون ماء وحوالي 100 منزل بلا كهرباء. شي طرقان خسرو ومصلحة السكك توقفات فالمناطق المتضررة ومطار نوتو ف محافظة إيشيكاوا مازال مسدود.
mt: The Japanese broadcaster NHK reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Company reported that there were no effects from the earthquake, but that the No. 1 and No. 2 reactors at the Kashiwazaki nuclear power plant were shut down. Reports said there were about 9,400 homes without water and about 100 homes without electricity in the area. Trains were suspended in the affected areas and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture remained closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: التسريب تيقول أن الوثيقة فيها صداع دلحدود اللي باغا فلسطين على أساس الحدود اللي كانو قبل من حرب الشرق الأوسط نتاع 1976. من بين الموايع اللي تم التطرق ليهاهي مستقبل القدس اللي كاتعتبر مدينة مقدسة للشعبين ونقاش واد الأردن. كتطالب إسرائيل باستمرار التواجد العسكري فلواد لمدّة عشر سنوات، بمجرّد توقيع اتفاق، فلوقت اللي كتوافق السلطة الفلسطينيّة على استمرار هاذ التواجد لخمس سنوات فقط.
mt: The leak says the document includes a proposal to give Palestine borders based on those that were in place before the 1976 Middle East War. Among the issues discussed were the future of Jerusalem, which is considered a holy city for both peoples, and the Jordan River. Israel is demanding continued military presence in the West Bank for ten years, upon signing an agreement, while the Palestinian Authority is only willing to accept a five-year presence.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: """ما"" تولد في هونغ كونغ، وقرا في جامعة نيويورك وكلية هارفارد ديال الحقوق، وواحد المرة عطاوه ""البطاقة الخضراء"" باش يكون مقيم دائم في أمريكا. هسيه قال في وقت دا لاتخابات قال باللي ""ما"" يقدر يهرب من البلاد في وقت الأزمة. هسيه زاد قال باللي ""ما"" اللي كيجيوه التصاور زوينين كيهتم بالشكل دياله أكثر من الجوهر. وواخا هاذ الاتهامات، ""ما"" ربح بسهولة على واحد برنامج سياسي الي كيطالب بتوثيق العلاقات مع البر الرئيسي ديال الصين."
mt: ""Ma"" was born in Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School, and once held the "green card" to become a permanent resident of the United States. He said in a time of crisis, ""Ma"" can flee the country. He added that ""Ma"" who takes the photos is more concerned with the appearance than the essence. And with these accusations, ""Ma"" easily won on a political program that calls for documenting relations with mainland China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: "من بعد ما كان باين أن بزاف ديال العائلات كانت باغية تأخذ مساعدة قانونية باش تكافح عمليات الإخلاء، داروا اجتماع في 20 مارس في ""مركز إيست باي القانوني المجتمعي"" لضحايا عملية احتيال الإسكان. - فاش الكرّايا بداو كيهدرو على داكشي لّي وقع ليهم، الأغلبيه ديال العائلات المعنيين ساقو الاخبار بلي كارولين ويلسون من هيئة الإسكان فأوكلاند سرقات العربون لي عطاو و هربات من المدينة. الكرّايا فلوكوود غاردنز كيسحاب ليهم بلي ربما كاين 40 عائلة اخرا و لاّ كثر لي غادي تخليهم يواجهو الإفراغ، حيتاش عرفو بلي البوليس ديال OHA كيحقق حتا فممتكات السكن ديال الدولة فأوكلاند لي يقدر يكون داها شي حد بالاحيال."
mt: "After it was revealed that some families were seeking legal assistance to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the "East Bay Community Law Center" for victims of housing fraud. - As the families were being told what had happened to them, the majority of the affected families were told that Carol Wilson of the Housing Authority in Auckland had stolen the money given to them and fled the city. The families in Lakewood Gardens were told that possibly another 40 families or more would be evicted, as they knew that the OHA police were investigating the state housing in Auckland that could have been a relative of the family."
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: من بعد السباق، باقي كيسلوسكي هو البطل ديال بطولة السائقين وعنده 2250 نقطة. جونسون متأخر بسبعة دنقاط وتيحتل المرتب الثاني ب 2,243. في المركز الثالث، كاين هاملين بعده بعشرين نقطة، ولكن متقدمًا على بوير بخمسة ديال نقاط. وكين وترويكس جونبور في المركز الخامس والسادس على التوالي، بـ2,220 و2,207 نقطة. ستيوارت وجوردون وكينسيث وهارفيك كلهم خرجو من المراكز العشرا اللولة من البطولة ديال الشوافريا و باقي ربعا ديال السباقات فالمَوسم.
mt: After the race, Kovalainen is the Drivers' Champion with 2250 points. Johnson is seven points behind in second place with 2,243. Hamlin is third, 20 points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kim and Truex Jr. are fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick all dropped out of the top ten in the points standings after the race, leaving the final quarter of the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: كيقولو أن هاذي هي المرة الخامسة فالتاريخ اللي كيلاحضو فيها الناس أنه تيطيح على الأرض داكشي اللي تبين أنه مادة مريخية مؤكدة كيميائيًا. غير 34 من أصل 24,000 نيزك معروف اللي طاحو فالأرض هوما اللي متأكدين أن أصلهم من كوكب مارس. وخمستاش من هاذ الصخور جات مع النيزك اللي طاح في يوليوز اللي فات. شي أحجار اللي قلالين فالأرض كيتباعو مابين 11,000 تال 22,500 دولار للأونصة الواحدة، وهدا غلا بعشرة دلمرات من ثمن الذهب.
mt: 34 of the 24,000 known meteorites that have fallen to Earth are confirmed to be Martian in origin. Five of these meteorites fell in July. Martian meteorites are sold for between $11,000 and$22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: كان خاص شوماخر اللي تقاعد ف 2006 من بعد ما ربح فورميلا وان سبعة دلمرات كان خصو يعوض فيليب ماسا اللي كان مصاب. البرازيلي تضرب واحد الضربه خطيرة بعدما دار كسيدا فالسباق العالمي ديال الطوموبيلات غادي تغادر ماسا الدوري فهادشي اللي بقا ف الموسم د 2009 على الأقل.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who retired after winning seven consecutive titles, was to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured. The Brazilian suffered a serious blow after a crash in the World Championship of motor racing will leave Massa at least the season of 2009.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: حتى لدابا، أمريكا اونلاين كانت قادْره باش تحرك و تطور السوق ديال الميساجات (الرسائل) الفورية بالسرعة لي بغات، حيتاش كانت منتاشرا فمريكان بواحد الشكل كبير. فاش تدار هاد التغيير ممكن توقف هاد الحرية. العدد دلمستخدمين نتاع ياهو! وخدمات ميكروسوفت غايتجمعو باش يتنافسو مع عدد لمستخدمين نتاع AOL.
mt: Even before AOL, America Online was able to move and grow the market for instant messaging at the speed it wanted, because it was spread in a large form. When this change can stop this freedom. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services gathered to compete with the number of AOL users.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: واحد الطوموبيل مفخخة تفركعات فالكوميسارية ديال مدينة غازي عنتاب التركية البارح الصباح وماتوا فيها جوج ديال البوليس واتجرجوا أكثر من عشرين واحد آخرين. قال لبيرو نتاع الحاكم أن 9 من الناس اللي تقاسو من ضباط دلبوليس. قالو البوليس أنهم شاكين فشي مجند ديال داعش هو اللي من مورا هاد الهجوم.
mt: 9 police officers were killed and 20 others injured when a car bomb exploded at a gas station in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning. The governor said 9 of the dead were police officers. Police said they suspected a Daesh recruit was behind the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: حاكم ولاية ماساتشوستس اللي فات ميت رومني ربح في الانتخابات التمهيدية الرئاسية ديال الحزب الجمهوري في فلوريدا نهار الثلاث بأكثر من 46 في المائة من الأصوات. نيوت جينجريتش، رئيس مجلس النواب الأمريكي اللي فات، جا في المرتبة الثانية بالنسبة ديال 32%. فلوريدا حيث هي الولاية الرابحة اللي واخذة كل شيء، عطات كل الأصوات ديال المندوبين ديالها الخمسين لرومني، وهاذشي خلا المركز دياله يولي أقوى ويكون هو المرشح الأول في لائحة ترشيحات الحزب الجمهوري.
mt: Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. House Speaker Newt Gingrich, who dropped out of the race, came in second with 32 percent. Florida, where all 57 delegates are at stake, awarded all 50 of its delegates to Romney, making him the strongest candidate and the first choice of the Republican Party.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: حاكم ولاية ماساتشوستس اللي فات ميت رومني ربح في الانتخابات التمهيدية الرئاسية ديال الحزب الجمهوري في فلوريدا نهار الثلاث بأكثر من 46 في المائة من الأصوات. نيوت جينجريتش، رئيس مجلس النواب الأمريكي اللي فات، جا في المرتبة الثانية بالنسبة ديال 32%. فلوريدا حيث هي الولاية الرابحة اللي واخذة كل شيء، عطات كل الأصوات ديال المندوبين ديالها الخمسين لرومني، وهاذشي خلا المركز دياله يولي أقوى ويكون هو المرشح الأول في لائحة ترشيحات الحزب الجمهوري.

src: "رئيس مجلس النواب اللي فات نيوت جينجريتش، وحاكم تكساس ريك بيري، وعضوة الكونجرس ميشيل باكمان خذاو البلاصة الرابعة والخامسة والستة مور بعضياتهم. من بعد ما بانت النتائج، شكر جينجريتش سانتوروم، ولكنه قال كلام قاسح لرومني، واللي تنشرات حملة إعلانية سلبية عليه ف ولاية آيوا ضد جينجريتش. قال بيري أنه باغي ""يرجع لتيكساس باش يدير تقييم لنتائج تجمع دهاد الليلة، ويحدد واش عندو شي طريق مزال فهاد السباق،"" ولكن قال من بعد أنه غادي يبقا فالسباق ويتنافس على المركز الأول فجنوب كارولينا ف 21 فيناير. قررت باكمان، اللي فازت في استفتاء آميس سترو في غشت، أنها غادي تسالي حملتها الانتخابية."
mt: "House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann were among the first three to drop out of the race. After the results were announced, Gingrich thanked Santorum, but he said harsh words to Romney, who ran a negative advertising campaign against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he wanted to "return to Texas to assess the results of last night's caucus, and determine whether he has a path forward in this race," but he later said he would stay in the race and compete for first place in South Carolina on January 21. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to suspend her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "السيت ويب نتاع لإذاعة تيوصف لبرنامج على أنه ""من مسرح الراديو من الطراز لقديم مع شي حاجة فشكل جديدة ومزدحة!"" في الايام الأولى، اتذاع البرنامج حصراً على موقع راديو الإنترنت الموجود منذ فترة طويلة ""توجي نت راديو""، وهو الموقع اللي كيركز على الراديو الحواري. في التالي ديال عام 2015، دارت ""توجي نت"" راديو ""أسترو نت "" كراديو تابع ليها. لبرنامج كان تيقدم هواة نتاع لافوا أوف محليين نتاع شرق تيكساس."
mt: "The website of the radio station describes the program as ""a radio drama of the old style with something new and exciting!"" in its early days, the program was broadcast exclusively on the long-standing ""Togi Net Radio"" website, which focuses on radio talk. In 2015, ""Togi Net"" Radio ""Astro Net"" was launched as a subsidiary radio station. The program was hosted by local and amateur radio enthusiasts from East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: جاو لمهاجمين نتاع مومباي ف 26 موفمبر 2008 وجابو معاهم قنابل وسلاح أوطوماتيك وضربو بلاص بزاف منهم لمحطة دتران شهاتراباتس شيفاجي اللي كتكون عامرة وأوطيل تاج محل المشهور. عاون استكشاف وجمع المعلومات اللي دارو ديفيد هيدلي في العملية اللي داروها 10 مسلحين من الجماعة الباكستانية المسلحة لشكر طيبة. هاد الهجوم خلاّ واحد الضغط كبير على العلاقات بين الهند و باكيستان
mt: 26 November 2008, 10 militants attacked Mumbai and took hostages with them at Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station, which was crowded and popular with tourists. David Headley helped in the investigation of the attack, which was carried out by 10 militants from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. This attack put a lot of pressure on the relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "ناضال غلب الكندي ب 7–2. راه خسر هاذ الايامات ضد راونيتش في بطولة بريسبان المفتوحة. جمع ناضال 88% دالنقط فالماتش وربح 76 نقطة فالإرسال الأول. من بعد الماتش، الملك ديال كلاي قال؛ ""أنا فرحان حيث قدرت نرجع في الجولات الأخيرين ديال كاع الأحداث المهمين، أنا هنا باش نحاول نربح هاذشي."""
mt: "Canada beat the Netherlands 7–2. They lost earlier this week to Russia in the Brisbane Open. Canada won 88% of the points in the match and won 76 points in the first set. After the match, King of Clay said; ""I'm happy where we were able to come back in the last few games of all important events, I'm here to try to win this."""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: قالت وكالة Nake News أنها غاتزيد اللغات العالمية الي غاتنقل بيهم الأخبار بشكل كبير بإضافة ثلاث إذاعات جديدة. كتدير المنظمة العالمية تقارير باللغات الإنجليزية واليابانية من قبل، ودابا دارت برامج باللغة الإسبانية والإيطالية والكورية للتلفزيون والانترنت والبورطابلات.
mt: Nake News said it has increased its global coverage by adding three new languages. In addition to its existing English and Japanese services, the organization now broadcasts programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, the Internet and mobile phones.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: "من بعد الحدث ديال الأربع، تنافس كاربانيدو في جوج سباقات فردية في البطولة. أول سباق شاركت فيه كان سباق التزلج المتعرج، والنتيجة ديالها كانت ""مسالاتش السباق"" في أول جولة. و 36 من أصل 116 واحد خذاو نفس النتيجة في هاذ السباق. السباق الآخر اللي شاركت فيه كان - سباق التزلج المتعرج العملاق - ودخلت في المركز العاشر في مجموعة جلوس السيدات وكان المجموع ديال وقت الجري ديالها 4:41.30، وهو أقل بـ 2:11.60 دقيقة من الوقت ديال النمساوية كلوديا لوش اللي دخلت في المركز الأول، و 1:09.02 دقيقة من المجرية جيونجيي داني اللي دخلت في المركز التاسع. ربعة ديال المتزلّجات في فريق المعوقين مقدروش يكملوا الجولة ديالهم، و45 من أصل 117 متزلّجة في سباق التعرّج العملاق مقدروش ياخذوا مركز في السباق."
mt: "After the event of the four, Carpanedo competed in two individual races in the championship. The first race she competed in was the slalom, and the result was "missed the race" in the first round. Of the 116 racers, 36 took the same result in this race. The other race she competed in was the giant slalom, and she entered the tenth place in the ladies' group and her group's running time was 4:41.30, which was 2:11.60 minutes slower than the Austrian Claudia Lösch who entered first, and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the Hungarian Giongiy Dan who entered ninth. Four of the disabled skiers were unable to complete their round, and 45 of the 117 slalom racers were unable to take a place in the race."
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: وقفات الرابطة الوطنية الأمريكية لكرة السلة (NBA) الموسم الاحترافي ديالها نظرا لقلق بشأن كوفيد 19. جا لقرار نتاع جمعية كرة السلة الأمريكية من بعد مابان واحد اللاععب ف أوتاه جاز بوزيتيف ب كوفيد-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) season was suspended due to concerns over the coronavirus. The decision came after a player on the Utah Jazz tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: وقفات الرابطة الوطنية الأمريكية لكرة السلة (NBA) الموسم الاحترافي ديالها نظرا لقلق بشأن كوفيد 19. جا لقرار نتاع جمعية كرة السلة الأمريكية من بعد مابان واحد اللاععب ف أوتاه جاز بوزيتيف ب كوفيد-19.
mt: The National Basketball Association (NBA) season was suspended due to concerns over the coronavirus. The decision came after a player on the Utah Jazz tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: اللاعب ديال هاد اليوم هو أليكس اوفيتشكين من واشنطن العاصمة. سجّل جوج إصابات ودار جوج تمريرات مهمين في الماتش اللي غلب فيه فريق واشنطن على فريق أتلانتا ثراشرز بالنتيجة ديال 5-3. لباس الأول ديال أوفشكين عطى الماتش الليلة فاش سجل الصاعد نيكلاس باكستروم هدف الفوز. وكانت الإصابة دياله الثانية اللي سجلها في ذيك الليلة هي الإصابة رقم 60 دياله في هاذ الموسم، وولى هو أول لاعب كيسجل 60 إصابة أو أكثر في موسم واحد من 1995-96، منينفاش حقق جارومير جاجر وماريو ليميكس هاذ الإنجاز.
mt: The player of the day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two key assists in the game that beat the Atlanta Thrashers by a score of 5-3. The first of Ovechkin's two goals last night was given to the game tonight when he scored the game-winning goal. His second goal last night was his 60th goal of the season, making him the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux accomplished this feat.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "بنك نورثرن روك تأمم ف 2008 فاش بان بأنه شد معاونة مستعجلة من الحكومة دبريطانيا. طلبات نورثرن روك الدعم بسبب داكشي اللي وقعلها فالأزمة دالرهن العقاري ف 2007. قدمات مجموعة فيرجين نتاع السير ريتشارد برانسون واحد العرض للبنكة واللي ترفض قبل تأميم البنك. في عام 2010 ومنين تامم تم فصل البنك الحالي للشارع الرئيسي نورذرن روك عن باد بنك، نورذن روك (إدارة الأصول). فرجين مشراتش الشركه ديال إدارة الممتلكات و لكن شرات غِير ""كود بانك"" لّي تابع ل نورثرن روك."
mt: 2008, Northern Rock was nationalised after it was forced to seek emergency assistance from the British government due to the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Northern Rock was split from its parent company, Northern Rock (Asset Management), in 2010. Virgin Money, the property management company, was not part of the "Northern Rock" group.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: القرار ديال السيد رود أنه يسني اتفاق كيوتو للمناخ عول الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية اللي غادي تكون هي الدولة المتقدمة الوحيدة اللي ماصادقاتش على هاد الاتفاق. رفضت حكومة أستراليا المحافظة اللي فاتت التصديق على بروتوكول كيوتو على أساس أنه غادي يضر الاقتصاد حيث كيعتمد بشكل كبير على صادرات الفحم، رغم انها ما لزماتش دول بحال الهند والصين بأهداف للحد من الانبعاثات.
mt: The Bush administration announced that it would not ratify the Kyoto Protocol, making the United States the only major industrialized country not to do so. The conservative government of Australia, which had previously refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol on the grounds that it would harm the economy, which was heavily dependent on coal exports, despite the fact that countries such as India and China were not required to meet emission reduction targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

mt: The Bush administration announced that it would not ratify the Kyoto Protocol, making the United States the only major industrialized country not to do so. The conservative government of Australia, which had previously refused to ratify the Kyoto Protocol on the grounds that it would harm the economy, which was heavily dependent on coal exports, despite the fact that countries such as India and China were not required to meet emission reduction targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: "كان خاص لعساسة دلغابة يتابعو الرماة اللي كانو التجربة التكميلية لمكافحة الآفات اللي تمت مراقبتها وتقييم فعاليتها. في شراكة بين ""مصلحة المتنزهات الوطنية والحياة البرية"" و ""جمعية الرماة الرياضيين في أستراليا""، تختارو متطوعين مؤهلين في إطار برنامج الصيد اللي تابع للجمعية. وعلى حسب داكشي اللي قال ميك أوفلين، القائم بأعمال مدير منظّمة الحفاظ على المنتزهات والتّراث التّابعة لNPWS، أن الربعة ديال الصيادين الّلي اختاروهم باش يديرو أول عملية صيد عطاوهم إرشادات السلامة والتدريبات كلها."
mt: "The event was attended by senior officials who were observing the trial of the pest control program. In a partnership between the National Parks and Wildlife Service and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia, qualified volunteers were selected in the context of the Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Farrell, acting director of the National Parks and Wildlife Service, the four hunters selected were given safety instructions and all the training."
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "الاستناد لهاذ الحفرية كيعني أن الانشقاق وقع بكري بزاف على اللي كان متوقع يلا رجعنا للدليل الجزيئي. قال الباحث ف ريفت فالي ريسورش سيرفايس فإيثوبيا و المؤلف المشارك فالدراسة ديال بيرهان أسفاو بلي خاص ""كلشي يرجع لبلاصتو"" ."
mt: "The fact that the rift is so far from what was expected based on the molecular clock suggests that the split occurred much earlier than we thought," said the study's lead author, Yilma R. Restifo, a postdoctoral fellow at the Ethiopian Rift Valley Research Service, and a co-author of the study with Berhanu Asfaw, who said, ""Everything is local."" "
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: فاش كان كيلقي الكلمة دياله في معرض طوكيو لألعاب الفيديو نهار الخميس، هضر رئيس شركة نينتندو ساتورو إواتا لأول مرة على تصميم نظام التحكم في كونسول نينتندو ريفولوشن الجديد. بحال تيليكوموند دالتلفزة، كيستخدم جهاز التحكم جوج دلمستشعرات كاينين حدا التلفزة باش ترد بلاصتها مثلثة فداك الفضاء الثلاثي الأبعاد. هادشي غادي يسمح ل اللَّعابة باش يتحكمو فاللأفعال و الحركات فألعاب الفيديو من خلال تحريك الجهاز فلهوى .
mt: In his first public comments on the new Nintendo Revolution controller, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata told the Tokyo Game Show on Thursday that the device uses two sensors like a television remote to track its movements in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control in-game actions and movements by moving the device itself.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.
