src: علنات وكالة الأنباء الصينية شينوا في وقت سابق على اختطاف طائرة. قالت التقارير من بعد أن الطيارة تلقت تهديد بالتفجير وبدلات الطريق ديالها لأفغانستان وهبطات ف قندهار. كتقول التقارير أن الطيارة رجعات لأفغانستان من بعد ماتمنع الهبوط الإضطراري ديالها ف أورومقي.
mt: The Xinhua news agency earlier reported the plane was hijacked. Reports later said the plane received a bomb threat and its crew was forced to land in Kandahar. Reports say the plane returned to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Urumqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "علنات السكريترة الدائمة فلجنة نوبل للأدب فالأكاديمية السويدية سارة دانيوس نهار الإثنين فواحد البرنامج فراديو Sveriges فالسويد أن اللجنة اللي مقدراتش توصل لبوب ديلان براسو باش تخبرو بالفوز بجائزة نوبل في الأدب لعام 2016 وقفت محاولة للوصول إليه. دانيوس قالت ""باللي ما غادي يديرو والو دابا. حيث حاولت تتصل بيه وصيفطت الايميلات للناس الي خدامة معاه وجات لها ردود ظريفة في الحقيقة ولكن هاذشي كافي دابا."""
mt: "The permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, Sara Danius, said on Monday in a radio program in Sweden that the committee had tried to reach Bob Dylan to inform him of his win of the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, but had failed. Danius said, ""I tried to reach him, and sent emails to people who work with him, and got some nice replies, but that's enough for now."""
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "الرئيس ديال مِريكان جورج بوش كيرحّب بالقرار. جوردون جوندرو المتحدث الرسمي لبوش قال باللي تعهد كوريا الشمالية ""خطوة مهمة باش يتحقق هدف نزع السلاح النووي من شبه الجزيرة الكورية."""
mt: "President George W. Bush welcomed the decision. Gordon Johndroe, a White House spokesman, said the North Korean pledge was 'an important step toward the goal of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula.'"
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "في عام 1956 انتقل سلانيا إلى السويد وبدا الخدمة مع مكتب البريد السويدي بعد ثلاث سنين، ومن بعد ولى المسؤول على تصميم ونقش القطع النقدية. دار أكثر من 1,000 طابع للسويد و28 دولة أخرى. كتتميز أعماله بجودة وتفاصيل مميزة لدرجة خلاته أحد ""الأسماء المعروفة"" القليلة للغاية من بين هواة جمع الطوابع. بعض الناس تخصصوا في جمع أعماله فقط. كان طابعه رقم 1000 ""الأعمال العظيمة اللي قام بها الملوك السويديون"" من قبل ديفيد كلوكر إهرنشترال في سنة 2000، واللي تم إدراجها في موسوعة غينيس للأرقام القياسية العالمية. كان كيخدم أيضاً في نقش الأوراق النقدية لبزاف ديال الدول، ومن الأمثلة الحديثة على الخدمة دياله صور رئيس الوزراء على واجهة الأوراق النقدية الكندية الجديدة من فئة 5 دولارات و100 دولار."
mt: "In 1956, Selania moved to Sweden and began working for the Swedish Post Office after three years, and later became responsible for the design and engraving of the coins. He designed more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His works are characterized by quality and distinctive details to the extent that he is one of the few "famous" names among stamp collectors. Some people specialize in collecting his works only. His stamp number 1000 "The Great Works of the Swedish Kings" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000 was included in the Guinness World Records. He also served in engraving the banknotes of many countries, and examples of recent service include the portraits of the prime minister on the face of the new Canadian banknotes of the 5 dollar and 100 dollar denominations."
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: 800 ميل من نظام خط أنابيب ترانس ألاسكا تسدات من بعد ما تسربات آلاف البراميل من النفط الخام ف الجنوب ديال مدينة فيربانكس ف ولاية ألاسكا. واحد العطل كهربائي من بعد اختبار روتيني لنظام الحرائق خلا صمامات التصريف تتحل وتدفق النفط الخام بالقرب من محطة ضخ فورت غريلي رقم 9. فتح الصمامات سمح بْ تخفيف نظام الضغط أوتدفق الزيت عبر منصة إلى خزان يقدر يهز خَمسة أو خمسين/ألف 55000 برميل ( زوج فاصلة تلاتة 2.3 مليون جالون). ابتداءً من بعد ظهر الأربع، كانت فتحات الخزانات ما زال كتسرب غالباً بسبب التمدد الحراري داخل الخزان. حتى لدابا مازال ما تعمرت منطقة احتواء ثانويّة أخرى تحت الخزانات اللي قادرة تهز 104,500 برميلٍ.
mt: 800 miles of Trans-Alaska Pipeline System was shut down after thousands of barrels of crude oil spilled in the south of the city of Fairbanks in the state of Alaska. An electrical fault after routine testing of the fire system allowed the relief valves to open and the oil flow near Fort Greely Pump Station No. 9. Opening the valves allowed the pressure to be relieved and the oil to flow through the platform into a tank that can hold five or fifty thousand barrels (2.3 million gallons). Starting in the afternoon of the fourth, the tank openings were still leaking due to thermal expansion inside the tank. Even now, another secondary containment area under the tanks that can hold 104,500 barrels has not been recovered.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: سلاح المهندسين الأمريكيين قدَّر أن خَمْسطاش/15 سم من تساقطات الأمطار يمكن ليها تخترق السدود اللي متضررة من قبل. كاين فنينث غريد اللي داز فيه فيضان لعلو ديالو 20 قدم فإعصار كاترينا واحد علو دلما كتر من النص لاحقاش فاض السد اللي حداه. الما كيتكفح من السّد فالمستوى ديال 30.48 ميترو (100 قدم)
mt: 15 to 20 feet of rainfall could breach the levees damaged by the storm, according to the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers. The flood stage for the levee was 100 feet (30.48 meters) above sea level.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: هاميلتون قال باللي السبيطار ديال جامعة هوارد استقبل المريض وهو في حالة مستقرة. لمريض كان فنيجيريا فين كانو شي حالات نتاع فيروس إيبولا. تيتبع صبيطار بروتوكول نتاع التحكم فالعدوى بما فيها عزل لمريض على لوخرين باش متنتاقلش ليهم العدوى.
mt: Hamilton said the patient was admitted to the Howard University Hospital in stable condition. The patient was from Nigeria, where there have been Ebola virus cases. The patient is being isolated to prevent the spread of the disease.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: ربما المذنبات هي مصدر دتوصيل الما للأرض جنباً إلى جنب مع المواد العضوية اللي يمكن أنها تكون البروتينات وتدعم الحياة. من الوقت اللي ولات المذنبات كتصطادم مع الأرض والعلماء باغيين يفهمو كيفاش الكواكب تيتشكلو وخصوصا كيفاش تشكلات الأرض.
mt: Comets may be the source of water on Earth along with organic materials that may be proteins and support life. As the comets collide with the Earth, scientists are trying to understand how the planets form, especially how the Earth formed.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: فاش السلطات ماتاقوش بالتهديد، هيئة النقل ديال مريلاند قطعات بعدما مكتب التحقيقات الفدرالي لحّ عليهم. استعملوا شاحنات التفريغ باش يسدوا المدخل ديال النفق، و80 بوليسي قدموا المساعدة باش يوجهوا سائقي الطموبيلات لطرقٍ بديلة. مكاينش تعكال فسيركولاسيون نتاع طريق لبديلة نتاع لمدينة.
mt: After the authorities threatened to fine them, the Maryland Transportation Authority was ordered by the Federal Bureau of Investigation to use dump trucks to block the tunnel's entrance, and 80 police officers helped direct drivers to alternative routes. There was no traffic jam in the city's alternative route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "تنقل لمصور لسبيطار نتاع رونالد ريغن UCLA فين غايموت من بعد. وعلى حسب ما جا في التقارير، كان في العشرينيات من عمرو. وقال بيبر في بيان: ""واخا مكنتش حاضر ومكنتش كاين بشكل مباشر في هاذ الحادث المأساوي، فإن أفكاري ودعواتي كلها مع عائلة الضحية."" تبين موقع TMZ الإخباري الترفيهي أن المصور وقف طوموبيلته على الجانب الآخر من شارع سيبولفيدا بوليفارد وحاول يصور حاجز الشرطة قبل ميقطع الطريق ويكمل، وهاذشي خلا ضابط بوليس دورية لوطوروط ف كاليفورنيا يوقف حركة المرور باش يأمرو يرجع جوج مرات. وعلى حسب ما قالوه البوليس، الشيفور ديال الطوموبيل اللي ضربات المصوّر مغاديش تتوجه ليه وقيلا حتى شي تهمة جنائيّة."
mt: "The photographer was leaving Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center where the victim was taken. According to reports, he was in his twenties. Bieber said in a statement: "While I was not present and was not directly involved in this tragic accident, my prayers and thoughts go out to the family of the victim, as well as my hopes that the two passengers will soon be recovered and be repaired." TMZ, the entertainment news site, reported that the photographer was standing on the opposite side of Sepulveda Boulevard and tried to take pictures of the police barrier before he crossed the road and continued, which led a police officer in Los Angeles to stop traffic to order him to return twice. According to the police, the car that hit the photographer was not heading towards him and was not a criminal offense."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "قال الوزير الرئاسي رودريجو آرياس إن أرياس اتصاب بحالة خفيفة من الفيروس. حالة الرئيس مستقرة واخا غادي يتعزل شي يامات فالدار. واخا عندي السخانة والتهاب الحلق، ولكن حاس باللي راني مزيان ونقدر نخدم الخدمة ديالي من بعيد. قال أرياس فواح لبيان: ""كنتوقع نرجع للواجبات ديالي نهار لتنين""."
mt: "The presidential minister, Rodrigo Arias, said that Arias was infected with a mild case of the virus. The president's condition is stable and he will be in isolation for a few days at home. I have a sore throat and a fever, but I am fine and can continue to work from home. Arias said in a statement: "I expected to return to my duties on Tuesday.""
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: في الذروة دياله الإعصار المداري جونو - اللي اتسمى على اسم كيس أوراق النخيل بلغة جزر المالديف - وصلت سرعة الرياح دياله المتواصلة 240 كيلومتر في الساعة (149 ميل في الساعة). هاذ النهار بكري، كانت سرعة الرياح حوالي 83 كم/ساعة، وكان من المتوقع أنها تبقا غاديو وكتضعاف.
mt: At the peak of Cyclone Jono, named after a coconut leaf in the Maldives language, sustained winds reached 240 kilometres per hour (149 mph). This morning, the winds were about 83 km/h, and it was expected to continue to intensify.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: المد لحمر تيكون بزادة تركيز دوارة كارين لقصيرة، وهي كائن مائي أحادي الخلية. ممكن أن العوامل الطبيعية تتداخل وتعطي ظروف مثالية، اللي غاتخلي الطحالب تكتار بشكل كبير. الطحالب كتنتج واحد السم عصبي لي يقدر يشلل الأعصاب ديال البشر و الحوت. بزاف ديال الحوت كيموت بسبب التركز العالي ديال السموم في الماء. يقدر الانسان يتأثر لاستنشاق المياه المتأثرة اللي وصلت للهواء من خلال الرياح والأمواج.
mt: The red tide is caused by a microscopic organism called Karenia brevis. Natural factors can combine to create ideal conditions for the algae to bloom. The algae produce a neurotoxin that can paralyze humans and marine mammals. Some marine mammals have died from the high concentration of toxins in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling water that has been affected and reached the air through wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "فيليشيا، اللي كانت واحد النهار عاصفة من الدرجة الرابعة بالنسبة لمقياس سفير-سمبسون ديال الأعاصير، ما بقاتش مجهدة بسبب واحد المنخفض استوائي وغادي تمشي فحالها كاع نهار الثلاث. أنتجت بقايا ديالها الشتا عبر معظم الجزر، واخا أنه حتى ماتعلنش على شي أضرار أو فيضانات. توصفات الشتا اللي طاحت بمعدل 6.34 إنش أنها ""نافعة"". شي تساقطات دالشتا كانت معاها الرعاضي والبرق."
mt: "Philippines, which was hit by a Category 4 storm the previous day according to the Saffir-Simpson scale for hurricanes, was not affected by a tropical depression and will be back to normal on Wednesday. Its remnants produced snow across most of the islands, but there were no reports of damage or flooding. The snowfall, which totaled 6.34 inches, was described as "beneficial." Snowfall was accompanied by lightning and thunder."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: تحطمات طوموبيلبيكيه جونيور فسباق الجائزة الكبرى فسنغافورة عام 2008 بعدما وقف لفرناندو ألونسو بكري، الشيء لي أدى لإخراج سيارة الأمان. وكاع الطوموبيلات الي كانت سابقة ألونسو وقفات ورا سيارة الأمان وهي كتعمر بالليسانس، وطلع هو لقدام وقدر يربح. تقال بيكيه جونيور بعد سباق الجائزة الكبرى فسنغافورة عام 2009.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash: A car driven by Fernando Alonso stopped on the track, causing the safety car to be deployed. All cars behind Alonso stopped, including the safety car, which was then passed by Alonso, who went on to win. The safety car was then passed by the cars behind it, including Lewis Hamilton, who won the race. The safety car was then passed by the cars behind it, including Lewis Hamilton, who won the race.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: واحد الدراسة تنشرت نهار الخميس في مجلة العلوم قالت باللي نوع جديد من الطيور كيتمون في جزر غالاباغوس في الإكوادور. قالو الباحثين فجامعة برسنستون فالولايات المتحدة الأمريكية وجامعة أوبسالا فالسويد أن الأنواع الجديدة تطورات غير فجوج دلأجيال واخا هاد المسيرة كتاخد مدة كتر بسبب التكاثر بين عصفور داروين المستوطن، حصون ال Geospiza، وعصفور الصبار المهاجر، كونيروستريس ال Geospiza.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science said a new species of birds have evolved on the Galapagos Islands in Ecuador. The researchers from Princeton University in the United States and the University of Uppsala in Sweden said the new species evolved in just a few generations and that the process took longer because of breeding between Darwin's finch, the Geospiza, and the migrant finch, Conirostris the Geospiza.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: الحدث الفني كان غير جزء من الحملة لي دارها المجلس ديال مدينةْ بوخاريست و لي فيه كانو كيحاولو من خلالها باش يعطيو واحد الصورة للعاصمة الرومانية على انها مدينة إبداعية و فيها اللوان بزاف. غادي تكون المدينة اللولة فجنوب شرق أوروبا لي غادي تستاضف كووباراد ولي هو أكبر حدث فني عمومي فالعالم، ما بين شهر شهر سته و تمنيا.
mt: The event was part of a campaign by the city council of Bucharest to try to give the Romanian capital the image of an innovative city with many colors. It will be the first city in Southeast Europe to host the Copacabana, the largest public art event in the world, between June 6 and 10.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: كانت الطيارا غاديا ل إيركوتسك و كانو ااقوات الداخلية لي كيخدموها بداو واحد التحقيق باش يعرفوا شنو وقع. كانت الطيارة Il-76 هي اللي سائدة فالعسر نتاع روسا والاتحاد السوفياتي من سنوات 1970 واخا هكاك دارت كسيدة خايبة فروسيا السيمانة اللي فاتت. تفك واحد المحرك فالإقلاع اللي كان ف7 أكتوبر، ولكن مكانتش شي خسائر. وقفات روسيا طائرات Il-76s لمدة قصير من بعد داك الحادث.
mt: The pilot was en route to Irkutsk and the Interior Ministry was investigating what happened. The Il-76 was the most common aircraft in the Soviet Union and Russia from the 1970s until the collapse of the Soviet Union. One engine failed during takeoff on October 7, but there were no injuries. Russia has grounded its Il-76s for a short time after that incident.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: قبل عائلة سمبسون، سيمون خدم في بزاف ديال العروض في مواقف مختلفة. وخلال الثمانينيات من القرن اللي فات، خدم ف عروض بحال تاكسي وتشيرز وذا تريسي أولمان شو. في سنة 1989 ساهم في خلق سمبسنز مع بروكس وكرونينغ، وكان مسؤول على توظيف أول فريق كتابة لهاذ لبرنامج. واخا مبقاش فالبرنامج من عام 1993، إلا أنه احتفظ بلقب المنتج التنفيذي، وبقات كتوصلو عشرات الملايين من الدولارات كل موسم من حقوق الملكية الفكرية.
mt: Before the Simpsons, Simpson worked in various positions on several shows. In the 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the first writing staff for the show. Although he left the show in 1993, he retained the title of executive producer, and continued to earn millions of dollars each season in royalties.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: فلوك كتب باللي المحاولات ديال شي ناس باش يسكتوا العيالات وميبقاوش يهضروا على الصحة ديال العيالات منجحاتش. وصلات لهاد الخلاصة من بعد ماوصلاتها بزاف دالتعاليق الإيجابية والتشجيع من الرجال والنسا اللي تيقولو أن موانح الحمل كاتعتبر ضرورة طبية.
mt: If you are trying to silence women and prevent them from advocating for their health, you are wrong. This conclusion was reached after receiving a lot of positive feedback and encouragement from men and women who say that the pregnancy is a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "غادير لحال سلوك دالما. هي شفافة تماما بحال الما. إذا كنت واقف على الخط الساحلي غادي تقدر تشوف واش لحجر هاداك ولا شي مادة لزجة. على حسب ما عرفنا، كاين تما غير جسم كوكبي واحد كيعرض ديناميكية أكثر من تيتان، وسميته الأرض،"" أضاف ستوفان."
mt: "The Earth is a planet. It is transparent like water. If you stand on the shoreline, you can see if there is a rock there or some viscous material. According to what we know, there is only one celestial body that exhibits dynamics more than Titan, and it is called the Earth,"  added Stofan.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: هذا مكيأكدش أن بعض الديناصورات على الأقل كان عندها الريش ، أوهادي نظرية منتشرة بزاف ، ولكن كتقدم أيضا تفاصيل اللي الحفريات على العموم ما كتقدًمهاش ، بحال اللون والترتيب ثلاثي الأبعاد. . تيقولو العلماء إن الريش ديال هاد الحيوان كان بني كستنائي من لفوق وشاحب أو كاروتينويدي فالجانب السفلي. لاكتشاف تيعطي تفسير لتطور الريش عند الطيور. لحقاش الريش ديال الديناصورات معندوش شي سلسلة مهمة وكاملة للتطور، سميتها العمود الفقري، ولكنها عندها خصائص أخرى ديال الريش -بحال النتوءات والنتوءات الصغيرة- ولقاو الباحثين باللي العمود الفقري كان غالبا نشأة تطورية جات من بعد هاذ الخصائص الأخرى. التركيبة نتاع الريش تتقول بأنهم ماكانوش تيتستخدمو باش يطيرو ولكن باش يريكلو لحرارة. اقتارحو الباحثين أنه واخا هدا زنطيط نتاع شي ديناصور صغير فراه العينة كتبين ريش نتاع طيور كبار ماشي نتاع لفراخ. قتارحو الباحثين أنه واخا هدا زنطيط نتاع شي ديناصور صغير فراه العينة كتبين ريش نتاع طيور كبار ماشي نتاع لفراخ.
mt: This has not been confirmed, but some dinosaurs at least had feathers, or at least some of the most popular theories, but also details that the fossils in general have not provided, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.  Scientists say the feathers of this animal were brownish from above and pale or carotenoid from below.  The discovery gives an explanation for the evolution of feathers in birds.  The feathers of dinosaurs do not have a complete and important evolutionary sequence, called the backbone, but they have other features of feathers - such as bumps and small bumps - and researchers found that the backbone was often a result of evolutionary development after these other features.  The composition of the feathers says that they were not used to fly but to regulate heat.  Researchers have suggested that this is a small dinosaur that the sample has the feathers of large birds, not those of chicks.  Researchers have suggested that this is a small dinosaur that the sample has the feathers of large birds, not those of chicks.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: فلوقت اللي فيه واحد تجربة داللقاح كتبان أنها كتنقص من الوفيات نتاع إيبولا، مازال لحد الساع مكاينش شي دوا اللي تايداوي العدوى اللي كاينين. بين المضاد الحيوي، ZMapp، أنه فعال فهاد المجال، ولكن الدراسات الرسمية كتقول أنه معندوش نفس التوقعات اللي كانت فأنه يعتق من الموت. في تجربة ديالPALM خدموا بالدوا الي سميته ZMapp للمراقبة يعني أن العلماء اخترعو باش يكون الأساس اللي غادي يقارنوا بيه الدوايات الثلاثة الأخرى.
mt: In the meantime, there is no drug that can treat the disease. Among the antivirals, ZMapp, has been shown to be effective in this area, but official studies say it does not have the same expectations that it would be taken from death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control, meaning that scientists invented it to be the basis for comparing the three other drugs.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: قالو شي علماء من كلية الطب فجامعة ستانفورد نهار الاثنين أنهم اختارعو أداة تشخيصية جديدة كتفرز الخلايا حسب النوع: شريحة صغيرة قابلة للطباعة يمكن تصنيعها باستخدام ليزامبغيمون العديين بسنت واحد لكل وحدة. باحثين كبار تيقولو أن هادشي ممكن يؤدي للكشف المبكر على السرطان وداء السل والسيدا والملاريا فالدول محدودة الدخل الي فيها نسب تجاوز الوفاة بسبب الأمراض بحال سرطان الثدي تقدر توصل للنصف مقارنة مع الدول الغنية.
mt: On Monday, scientists from Stanford University's medical school said they had created a new diagnostic device that can distinguish cells by type: a small, printable sheet that can be made using two lasers for one cent per unit. Senior researchers say this could lead to early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, AIDS, and malaria in low-income countries where death rates from diseases such as breast cancer can be halved compared to wealthy countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: اكتاشفو العلماء شي أشكال دالأرض منتشرة فواجهة القمر واللي كاتسما المنحدرات الفضية واللي غالبا نتجات على الانكماش البطيء ديال القمر. هاد جروفا تلقاو فكاع لبلايص فلقمر وباقيين فيهم آثار لعوامل الجوية كدليل على أن لحوادث لجيولوجية اللي سببتها وقعات غير مؤخرا. هاذ النظرية كتعارض مع الإدعاء بلِّي القمر مافيه حتى نشاط جيولوجي.
mt: Scientists have discovered a series of craters on the moon's far side, which they call lunar grooves, that are usually associated with slow lunar contraction. These grooves were found in the lunar highlands and have weathering features, indicating that the geologic events that caused them were recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon has no geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "ومن ذاك الوقت دخلات أديكويا للمحكمة ديال الشريف في إدنبرة بتهمة أنها قتلات ولدها. هي رهن الاعتقال وكاتسنا التهم والمحاكمة ولكن ممكن يكون شي واحد من أدلة د الشهود تشوهات لاحقاش التصويرة ديالها تنشرات على نطاق واسع. هادي ممارسة منتشرة فأماكن أخرى فالمملكة المتحدة ولكن العدالة الاسكتلندية كتخدم بشكل مختلف, واعتبرت المحاكم أن نشر الصور يمكن يكون تيجي من جهة طرف على حساب طرف آخر. قالت الروفيسورة باميلا فورغسون أن ""الصحفيين تيكونو معرضين للخطر فاش كينشرو تصاور أولا شي حاجة نتاع مشتبه بيهم."" قال مكتب التاج المسؤول بشكل عام على لادعاءات للصحفيين أنه مغتكونش تعليقات أخرى إلا من مورا لاتهام على الأقل."
mt: "And since then, Adecco has been charged with the murder of her son. She is in custody and charged with the crime and the trial, but one of the witnesses may have been tampered with later the picture of her was published widely. This practice is widespread in other parts of the United Kingdom, but the Scottish justice system works differently, and the courts have considered that the publication of the pictures can be from one side to the other. Professor Pamela Forson said, ""Journalists will be exposed to danger when they publish something about a suspect."" The Crown Office, which is responsible for the prosecution of journalists, has not commented further, at least on the charge."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: إضافة لجليد المدمر، ما زال الظروف الجوية القاسية عائق قدام جهود الإنقاذ. قتارح بيتمان أن الأوضاع مغديش تحسن حتال السيمانة الجاية. كيما قال بيتمان، الكمية والغلظ ديال الثلج، كيخليه يكون أخيب واحد بالنسبة للصيادا فهاد 15 عام اللخرا.
mt: In addition to the icebreaker, the harsh weather conditions were still an obstacle to rescue efforts. Captain Bittman said the conditions were not improving until the next tide. As Bittman said, the amount and thickness of the ice, which made it difficult for the fisherman in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "رفض روبرتس أنه يقول إمتى كتبدا الحياة، وهو سؤال مهم فاش كيتعلق الأمر بأخلاقيات الإجهاض، وقال أنه ماشي أخلاقي الواحد يعلق على حالات عندها هاد الخصوصية. واخا هكاك راه عاود التصريح دياله اللي فات وقال باللي قضية رو ضد ويد كانت قضية ""قانون الأراضي المستقر""، وزاد أكد على الأهمية ديال الاتساق ما بين أحكام المحكمة العليا. زاد أكد على أنه كيآمن بالحق الضمني ديال الخصوصية اللي كيعتمد عليه لقرار ديالو."
mt: "Roberts said he did not say when life begins, an important question in the context of the ethics of abortion, and said that it is not ethical for one to comment on cases where there is this privacy. However, he repeated his statement that the case of Roe v. Wade was a case of "land use stability", and added that the importance of consistency between Supreme Court rulings. He added that he believes in the implied right of privacy that was relied on in his decision."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: في الساعة 8:46 ديال الصباح بالضبط، المدينة كلها كانت ساكتة، وهاذي كانت اللحظة اللي ضربت فيها الطيارة الأولى الهدف ديالها . واحد جوج بولات ديال الضوو لي بقاو كيشوفو جيهت السّما الليل كامل. مازال كيبنيوا خمسة ديال ناطحات السحاب الجديدة في الموقع، وكاين مركز ديال النقل وجردة تذكارية في الوسط.
mt: 8:46 a.m. precisely, the whole city was silent, and this was the moment the first plane hit its target. Two searchlights remained to illuminate the night sky. Five new skyscrapers are still being built on the site, and a transportation hub and memorial gardens are in the center.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "كاع المداخل ديال لغار، اللي تسمات ""الأخوات السبعة""""، كيوصل القطر ديالها على الأقل من 100 لـ 250 متر (من 328 إلى 820 قدم). بينات صور الأشعة تحت الحمراء أن التغيرات في درجات الحرارة بين الليل والنهار كتبين أنها كهوف محتملة. هوما باردين كتَر من السطح اللي داير بيهم فالنهار أو دافيين أكتر فْ الليل. قال غلين كوشين من هيئة المساحة الجيولوجية الأمريكية وجامعة أريزونا الشمالية اللي كاينة ف فلاغصطاف فأريزونا أن ""السلوك الحراري نتاعهم ماشي ثابت بحال لغيران لكبيرة اللي كايني فالأرض اللي غالبا كتحافظ على نفس درجة الحرارة ولكن كيتوافق مع أنها تقابة غارقة فالأرض""."
mt: "All seven entrances to the cave, which are called the 'Sisters,' are estimated to be at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) deep. Infrared images show that the temperature changes between day and night are consistent with a potential cave. They are warmer than the surface during the day or cooler at night," said Glenn Cushing of the U.S. Geological Survey and Northern Arizona University, who is based in Flagstaff, Arizona. "The thermal behavior of them is not constant like the large ones that are usually on the ground but are consistent with a cave that is flooded in the ground."
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: كيتقال أن الراجل ساق شي عربة عندها تلاتة دروايض وعامرة بقنابل ودخل بيها فوسط بزاف دالناس. من بعد ماتقاسو لجرحى بتفركيع تشد الراجل اللي ممكن يكون فركع لقنبولة. ومعرفاتش السلطات سميتو حتى دابا، بالرغم من أنهم كيعرفو أنه من مجموعة الإيغور العرقية.
mt: It was reported that a man drove a truck with three trailers and a trailer full of explosives into a crowd. After the explosion, the man was found injured and was taken to hospital. The authorities have not yet identified the man, despite knowing that he is of the Igbo ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: ربحات جنوب إفريقيا فريق أول بلاكس ديال نيوزيلاندا فالماتش ديال اتحاد الرجبي الثلاثيه فملعب رويال بافوكينج لي كاين فرويتنبرج فجنوب إفريقيا. النتيجة النهائية كانت فوز بنقطة وحدة، 21 ل 20، واللي سالات سلسلة 15 انتصار نتاع أول بلاكس. بالنسبة لمنتخب جنوب أفريقيا ديال الريغبي، سالى خسران في خمسة ديال الماتشات مورا بعضياتم. كان هادا هو الماتش الأخير ل All Blacks اللي ربحو البطولة هادي جوج سيمانات. غادي تكون المبارات النهائية نتاع السلسلة السيمانة الجاية ف إليس بارك ف جوهانسبورغ، وغتلعب سبرينغبوكس ضد أستراليا.
mt: South Africa's Springboks lost to New Zealand's All Blacks in the Rugby Union Tri-Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was 21 to 20, and the All Blacks' 15th consecutive win. It was the Springboks' fifth loss in a row. This was the last match of the All Blacks' two-game series. The final match of the next series will be in Ellis Park, Johannesburg, and the Springboks will play against Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: حافضات لمحطة على لموقف نتاعها، واخا خسرات واحد لجيروسكوب من قبل فلمهمة لفضائية نتاعها، حتى تسالات الرحلة لفضائية. أفاد تشياو وشاريبوف بأنهما على بعد مسافةٍ آمنةٍ من دافعات تعديل الوضعية. رجعات المراقبة الأرضية الروسية الطيارات للخدمة ورجع الوضع الطبيعي فالمحطة.
mt: The crew of the control tower, which had lost one of its gyroscopes during the mission, were able to land the plane safely. The Russian ground control returned the aircraft to service and the situation returned to normal at the airport.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: كانت لمتابعة دالقضية في فريجينا لانها مقر شركة الأنتيرنيت الكبيرة AOL الي رفعات الدعوة. هذه هي المرة الأولى اللي كيتم فيها الحصول على إدانة باستخدام التشريع اللي دَّار سنه ألفين أو تلاتة/ 2003 باش يحبسو البريد الإلكتروني الجماعي ، اللي معروف أيضًا باسم البريد العشوائي ، من التوزيع غير المرغوب فيه فصناديق بريد المستخدمين.
mt: The case was being heard in Federal District Court in Alexandria, Virginia, because AOL is headquartered there. This is the first time a conviction has been obtained using the law enacted in 2003 to combat unsolicited bulk e-mail, also known as spam, from unwanted distribution in users' mailboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: حتى شي تحذير من تسونامي متعطى، وبحسب وكالة جاكارتا للجيوفيزياء، مغادي يتعطى حتى شي تحذير لاحقاش الزلزال موصلش لدرجة 6.5 المطلوبة. واخا واخا مكاينش خطر حدوث تسونامي، بدأ السكان في الخوف وبدأوا في مغادرة أعمالهم و ديورهم.
mt: A tsunami warning was not issued, and according to the Jakarta Geophysics Agency, a warning will not be issued until the earthquake reaches a magnitude of 6.5. However, there is no risk of a tsunami, people began to fear and began to leave their work and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: لقاو أن الشمس كتخدم بنفس المبادئ الأساسية اللي كتخدم بها النجوم الأخرى: لقاو أن النشاط ديال كاع النجوم في النظام جاي من اللمعان والدوران ديالها ماشي شي حاجة أخرى. كيتستخدم اللمعان والدوران باش يتحسب رقم روسب نتاع شي نجم، وهادشي متعلق بتدفق البلازما. كلما كان رقم نتاع روسبي صغير، كلما كانت النجمة أقل نشاط من حيت لنقلابات لمغناطيسية.
mt: We found that the Sun works on the same basic principles as other stars: we found that the activity of all the stars in the system comes from their brightness and rotation, not something else. The brightness and rotation are used to calculate the Rossby number of a star, which is related to the plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is because of its magnetic field.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: من بين 1,400 دلأشخاص اللي تم استطلاعهم قبل الانتخابات الفدرالية نتاع 2010، كبر عدد المعارضين لأن أستراليا تولي جمهورية بنسبة 8 فالمية على سنة 2008. ادعت رئيسة الوزراء المؤقتة جوليا غيلارد خلال حملة الانتخابات الفيدرالية لعام 2010 أنها كتعتقد أن أستراليا خاص تولي جمهورية فاش يسالي عهد الملكة إليزابيث الثانية. 34 في المية من اللي شاركوا ف الاستطلاع عندهم نفس الرأي، وهو أنهم باغيين تكون الملكة إليزابيث الثانية آخر الملوك ديال أستراليا. وبالنسبة للآراء اللي عكس بعضياتها في الاستطلاع، 29% من الناس اللي جاوبوا في الاستطلاع شايفين أن أستراليا خاصها تولي جمهورية في أسرع وقت، ولكن 31% شايفين أن أستراليا مخاصهاش تكون جمهورية كاع.
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election, the number of opponents to the monarchy increased by 8% in 2008. The interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard during the 2010 federal election campaign said she believed Australia should become a republic under the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34% of those surveyed had the same opinion, that they wanted Queen Elizabeth II to be the last monarch of Australia. As for the opposite opinions in the survey, 29% of people who answered the survey believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, but 31% believed that Australia should not become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: قالت ليسلي أون، المتحدثة الرسمية لمؤسسة Komen، أن المنظمة تبنات قاعدة جديدة مكتسمحش ومكتضمنش منح أو تمويلات للمنظمات اللي تحت تحقيقات قانونية. سياسة Komen قصات Planned Parenthood بسبب تحقيق تيديرو المندوب كليف ستيرنز على كيفاش تتصرف وتتحكم المنظمة فالأموال ديالها. كيحقق ستريمز فواش الضرائب كتستخدم فإفشال ديال برنامج التخطيط الأبوي لانو رئيس لجنة المراقبة، اللي كاينة تحت لجنة مجلس الشيوخ للطاقة.
mt: Leslie Aun, the organization's spokeswoman, said Komen has adopted a new policy that prohibits it from making or funding grants to organizations under investigation. Komen's decision to cut ties with Planned Parenthood because of an investigation by Sen. Chuck Grassley into how the organization handles its tax-exempt status. Grassley is investigating how Planned Parenthood uses federal funds in light of a congressional committee's investigation into the organization's abortion program.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "رجعو لبوليس نتاع مادهيا براديش لبيسي ولبورطابل اللي تسرقو. وقال نائب المفتش العام د. ك. أريا: ""راه احنا اعتاقلنا خمسة ديال الأشخاص اللي قاموا باغتصاب المرأة السويسرية ورجعنا البورطابل والبي سي بورطابل ديالها"". اسماء نتاع المتهمين هي بابا كانجار، رامبو كانجار، غزة كامجار و فيشو كانجار. قال مفوض الشرطة فشاندرا شيخار سولكاني أن المتهمين دازو فالمحكمة بوجوههم مغطيين."
mt: "Police in Madhya Pradesh have arrested five people in connection with the rape of the Swiss woman. Deputy Inspector General D. K. Arya said, "We have arrested five people who raped the Swiss woman and recovered the car and the car keys." The names of the accused are Papa Kanger, Rambo Kanger, Gazi Kanger and Vishu Kanger. Police Commissioner Chandrapur Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with their faces covered."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ولى Eee PC من ASUS اللي تطلق من قبل في جميع أنحاء العالم بسباب توفير التكاليف والقدرة الوظيفية، موضوع مثير في شهر تكنولوجيا المعلومات في تايبيه لعام 2007. لكن سوق المستهلكين لأجهزة الحاسوب المحمولة غادي يتنوع ويتغير جذرياً من بعد ما سيطرت شركة أسوس في 2007 على جائزة تايوان للاستدامة اللي تيعطيها القسم التنفيذي يوان دحكومة جمهورية الصين.
mt: 2007, the Eee PC from ASUS, which was released worldwide due to cost savings and functionality, was a hot topic in the technology industry in Taipei. However, the consumer market for mobile computers will change drastically after ASUS won the Taiwan Sustainability Award, which is given by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: بدات القضية ف 1 يناير فاش السكان المحليين بداو تيتشكاو ف لابوسط د أوبانازاوا من أنهم موصلوهومش ليكارط التقليدية واللي موالفين نتاع راس العام. اعتادر مكبت لابوسط البارح للمواطينين والإعلام من بعد ماعرفو أن الدري خبع كتر من 600 وثيقة نتاع لابوسط، بما فيها 429 كارط نتاع راس العام اللي موصلوش للناس اللي مسيفطين ليهم.
mt: 1 January, local residents began to complain about the lack of traditional carvings in the Obanazawa area. The Obanazawa office was closed to the public and the media after it was found to have more than 600 documents related to the Obanazawa area, including 429 carvings that were not delivered to the people who were sent to them.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: خسر موراي المجموعة الأولى فالشوط الفاصل بعدما دازو إرسالات صعاب فالمجموعة. خدا ديل بوترو ميزة مبكرة ف المجموعة الثانية، لكن هادشي تطلب أيضاً كسر التعادل بعد الوصول إلى 6-6. تلقا بوترو العلاج فكتفو فهاد اللحظة ولكن قدر أنه يرجع للماتش.
mt: Murray lost the first set after a difficult service game in the first set. Del Potro took an early lead in the second set, but this also required a break of serve to reach 6-6. Del Potro received treatment at this moment, but was able to return to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "كانوا معاه ذاك المسؤولين، وقال للمواطنين ديال تكساس أنه غادي ياخذ الخطوات اللازمة باش يحمي السلامة ديال الجمهور. قال بيري بالتدقيق، ""كاين بزاف دلبلايص فالعالم اللي مقومين مزيان باش يتجاوزو التحدي اللي فهاد القضية."" وزاد قال الحاكم ""اليوم عرفنا أن شي دراري فتقادة دالتلامد دلمدرسة كانو على اتصال مع لمريض"". وتابع قائلاّ ""هاذ القضيّة خطيرةٌ. كن مطمئناً إلى أن نظامنا يعمل كما ينبغي."""
mt: "They were with him, and told the people of Texas that he would take the necessary steps to protect the public safety. Perry said in a statement, "There are a number of challenges around the world that are well-positioned to overcome the challenge of this case." The governor added, "We learned today that some of the leaders of the school were in contact with the patient." He continued, "This is a serious case. We are confident that our system is working as it should.""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: لمدة طويلة وقبل مايديرو The Daily Show و The Colbert Report كان هيك و جونسون تيفكرو ينشرو باروديا ساخرة كتحاكي الأخبار—والتقارير الإخبارية— فاش كانو طلبة فجامعة واشنطن. ولات أونيون من نهار تطلقات إمبراطورية دالأخبار بنسخة ورقية وموقع اللي شافوه 5,000,000 دالزوار فأكتوبر وزيد الإشهارات الشخصية وشبكة الأخبار نتاع 24 ساعة والبودكاسطات وأطلس العالم اللي تطلق مؤخرا سميتو أور دامب ورلد. آل غور والجنرال تومي فرانكس هضروا بالزربة على العناوين المفضلة عندهم (كان المفضل عند غور منين نشرات جريدة ذي أنيون أنه هو وتيبر مارسوا أفضل علاقة جنسية في حياتهم من بعد ما خسر في المجمع الانتخابي عام 2000). العديد من الكتاب ديالهم تمكنو من التأثير على برامج المحاكاة الساخرة للأخبار ديال جون ستيوارت و ستيفن كولبرت.
mt: For a long time before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert were producing satirical parodies of news—news reports—in their college days at the University of Virginia.  There was no union from the day they launched their news empire in print and website form, which saw 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, and added personal endorsements and 24-hour news network and podcasts and Atlas of the World, which was recently launched called The Onion Damph World.  Gore and General Tommy Franks were both featured on their favorite headlines (Gore's favorite was the newspaper headline that he and Tipper had the best sex of their lives after losing the 2000 election).  Many of the writers were able to influence the satirical news parody programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: لمدة طويلة وقبل مايديرو The Daily Show و The Colbert Report كان هيك و جونسون تيفكرو ينشرو باروديا ساخرة كتحاكي الأخبار—والتقارير الإخبارية— فاش كانو طلبة فجامعة واشنطن. ولات أونيون من نهار تطلقات إمبراطورية دالأخبار بنسخة ورقية وموقع اللي شافوه 5,000,000 دالزوار فأكتوبر وزيد الإشهارات الشخصية وشبكة الأخبار نتاع 24 ساعة والبودكاسطات وأطلس العالم اللي تطلق مؤخرا سميتو أور دامب ورلد. آل غور والجنرال تومي فرانكس هضروا بالزربة على العناوين المفضلة عندهم (كان المفضل عند غور منين نشرات جريدة ذي أنيون أنه هو وتيبر مارسوا أفضل علاقة جنسية في حياتهم من بعد ما خسر في المجمع الانتخابي عام 2000). العديد من الكتاب ديالهم تمكنو من التأثير على برامج المحاكاة الساخرة للأخبار ديال جون ستيوارت و ستيفن كولبرت.
mt: For a long time before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert were producing satirical parodies of news—news reports—in their college days at the University of Virginia.  There was no union from the day they launched their news empire in print and website form, which saw 5,000,000 unique visitors in October, and added personal endorsements and 24-hour news network and podcasts and Atlas of the World, which was recently launched called The Onion Damph World.  Gore and General Tommy Franks were both featured on their favorite headlines (Gore's favorite was the newspaper headline that he and Tipper had the best sex of their lives after losing the 2000 election).  Many of the writers were able to influence the satirical news parody programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: بدا لحتجاج مع ديك ل 11:00 فالتوقيت لمحلي (UCT+1) ف وايتهول مقابلة من دخلة د داونين ستريت اللي عاسين عليها لبوليس، السكن الرسمي نتاع رئيس الوزراء. المتظاهرين قطعوا الطريق مور ال 11:00 على الطوموبيلات اللي غاديين للشمال لوايتهول. طلب البوليس في الساعة 11:20من المتظاهرين باش يرجعوا للرصيف، وقالوا لهم بالي خاصهم يوازنوا ما بين الحق ديال التظاهر والحركة ديال المرور. تحركات المظاهرة من وايتهول في السّاعة 11:29 تقريبا، ودازو على ساحة ترافالغار، ومشاو في الستراند كله، حتى وصلوا لبألدويتش وكينغسواي من فوق في اتجاه هولبورن حيث كان تماك حزبُ المحافظين داير واحد المنتدى ديال الرّبيع في أوتيل غرف غراند كونوت.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC+1) in Whitehall, outside Downing Street, the official residence of the Prime Minister. Protesters blocked traffic heading north towards Whitehall. Police asked protesters at 11:20 to return to the pavement, saying they had to balance the right to protest with the flow of traffic. The march moved from Whitehall at around 11:29, and went to Trafalgar Square, and then along the Strand, until they reached Aldwych and Kingsway from above, heading towards Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding a Spring Forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: """- زاد قال : حنا دابا عندنا فيران عندهم رْبَع (4) شهور لي كانو مراض بالسكّار و لكن دابا مبقاوش مراض بيه"" الدكتور إيهود أور، أستاذ ديال الطب في جامعة دالهوزي في هاليفاكس، نوفا سكوتيا ورئيس ديال الشعبة الطبية والعلمية في الجمعية الكندية للسكري، حذر باللي البحث مازال عاد في أيامه الأولى. حتى هو بحال بزاف ديال الخبراء لوخرين عندو شك فإمكانية علاج السكري، وكيشير أن نتائج هاد البحث معندهاش علاقة بالناس اللي عندهم داء السكري من النوع الأول."
mt: "We have four years of data on these mice, and they were not diabetic at the beginning," said Dr. E. Dale Abel, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association's medical and scientific section. "I'm a little skeptical." He said the results have no relevance to people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: كان Twin Otter كيحاول الهبوط في كوكودا/ Kokoda البارح فالرحلة CG رَبْعلاف أو سْتَمْية أو رَبعة أو تمانين/ CG4684 اللي تابعة لشركة الخطوط الجوية PNG ، ولكن تم الإجهاض ديال هاد المحاولة فْ مرة وحدة . تقريبا شي عشرة ديال الدقائق قبل ما يوصل للأرض من المرة الثانية اللي قرب فيها ما بقاش يبان. اليوم لقاو البلاصة اللي طاحت فيها الطيارا اللي صعيب باش توصل ليها، لدرجة أنهم حطو جوج رجال من البوليس فالغابه باش يطلعو للبلاصة ديال الحادث و يقلبو على الناس اللي نجاو. تعرقل تقلاب بسباب لجو لخايب اللي سبب أن لهبوط يتلغى.
mt: A Twin Otter was attempting to land at Kokoda last night on flight CG 4684, operated by PNG Air, but was aborted once. About ten minutes before it was due to land again, it was aborted again. Today the crash site was found where the pilot had landed, so difficult to reach that two police officers had to go into the jungle to find the site and retrieve the survivors.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "لحسن الحظ أنه حتى حاجة ماوقعات ليا ولكن شفت واحد المشهد بشع اللي الناس حاولو يهرسو النوافذ باش يخرجو. الناس كانو تيضربو ليبلاطو بلكراسا، ولكن النوافذ مكانتش كتهرس. قال واحد من الناس اللي نجاو أن ""واحد فليبلاطو تهرس فالأخير، وبداو تيخرجو من النافذة""."
mt: "Fortunately, nothing happened to me, but I saw a gruesome scene where people were trying to break the windows to get out. People were hitting the glass with their fists, but the windows were not breaking. One of the people who escaped said, 'Finally, one of the glass panes broke, and they started to get out through the window.'"
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: العاصفه الإستوائية لّي مسمِّينها دانييل، و لّي هي رابع عاصفة فالموسم ديال الأعاصير الأطلسية ديال 2010، بدات فالشرق ديال المحيط الأطلسي. لعاصفة اللي بعيدة بشي 3,000 ميل على ميامي، فلوريدا كانت لفيتاس نتاع الريح 40 ميل فالساعة (64 كيلومتر فالساعة) . تيقولو العلماء فالمركز الوطني للأعاصير أن دانييل غيتحول لإعصار نهار الأربعاء. لحقاش العاصفة بعيدة على الأرض اليابسة، ما زال صعيب تقييم التأثير المحتمل على أمريكا أو منطقة البحر الكاريبي.
mt: The Atlantic tropical storm named Daniel, the fourth storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, began in the east of the Atlantic Ocean. The storm, about 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida was 40 mph (64 km/h) wind speed. Scientists at the National Hurricane Center said Daniel will become a hurricane on Wednesday. The next storm is far from land, it is still difficult to assess the potential impact on America or the Caribbean region.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: وقال الدكتور لي أنه ممرتاحش من جيهة التقارير اللي كتقول بأن الدراري في تركيا اتصابوا دابا بفيروس أنفلونزا الطيور A (H5N1) بلا ما يمرضوا. قال أن شي دراسات تتقول بأن المرض خاصو يكون فتاك قبل مايسبب وباء عالمي. كاين تخوف من أن لمرضى غيبقاو تيعاديو ناس بزاف إذا خلاو الروتين اليومي ديالهم وكانت لأعراض خفيفة.
mt: Dr Lee said he was reassured by reports that the two pilots in Turkey had been infected with the bird flu virus A (H5N1) without becoming ill. He said that some studies have suggested that the disease would have to be deadly before causing a global pandemic. There is concern that the patients could spread the disease to others if they deviate from their daily routine and had mild symptoms.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: اعتبارًا من ليلة 9 غشت، كانت عين موراكوت بعيدة بشي سبعين كيلومتر على مقاطعة فوجيان الصينية. كتشير التقديرات باللي الإعصار كيتحرك نحو الصين بسرعة حْداش كيلومتر فالساعة/ 11 كم / ساعة.
mt: As of 9 August night, the eye of Morakot was about 70 kilometers from the Chinese province of Fujian. Estimates indicate the typhoon is moving towards China at a speed of 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: وْصل الرئيس ديال مِريكان جورج بوش لسنغافورة يوم 16 نونبر فالصباح باش يدور مع راسو لمدة سيمانا. استقبلو نائب رئيس الوزراء السنغافوري وونغ كان سينغ وناقش قضايا التجارة والإرهاب مع رئيس وزراء سنغافورة لي هسين لونج. من بعد أسبوعٍ ديال الخسائر ف انتخابات التجديد النصفي، (بوش) قال للجمهور ديالو على توسيع التجارة ف قارة آسيا.
mt: 16 November, President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning to meet with his counterpart for a week. He was welcomed by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Woon Kang Sing and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm elections, (Bush) told his audience that he would expand trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: الإعلان ديال اليوم لّي صَدْراتو الحكومة كيمدد الالتزام ديالها بتمويل المزيد من صحاب الكوتْشِيات و اللي كان بدا من مارس من هاد العام. 300 عربة إضافية غادي تزيد العدد الإجمالي إلى 1,300 عربة غادي يجيبوهم باش يحلوا المشكلة ديال الزحام.
mt: 300 additional buses will bring the total to 1,300 buses to help alleviate the traffic problem.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "قالت أنه ""ماشي من الذكاء أنه نقولو كاين شي هجوم متوقع فالقريب"". واخا هكاك، فإن تخفيض مستوى التهديد إلى المستوى الخطير مكيعنيش أن التهديد العام تحيد."""
mt: "It's not intelligence that we're saying there's an imminent attack in the near future," he said. "But the fact that we've downgraded the threat level to severe doesn't mean the general threat has gone away."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: أدى مارتيلي البارح القسم في المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت (سيب) المكون من 9 أعضاء. هو المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت الخامس ديال مارتيلي خلال أربع سنين. قالت اللجنة الانتخابية الشهر اللي فات أن استقالة المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت جزء من الخطوات اللي غاتدفع البلاد لانتخابات جديدة. تشكيل اللجنة هو رد مارتيلي لانتشار المظاهرات المعادية للنظام الي بدت في اكتوبر لفشل فأنه يتدارو لنتخابات هو اللي سبب لمظاهرات اللي تيكون فيها دق شي مرات، شي وحدين من 2011.
mt: 9-member interim election commission was sworn in last night. It is the fifth interim election commission in four years. The election commission said last month that the resignation of the interim election commission was part of the steps that would lead the country to new elections. The formation of the commission is a response to the anti-government protests that began in October after the failure of the government to hold elections, which would be held twice, once in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: أدى مارتيلي البارح القسم في المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت (سيب) المكون من 9 أعضاء. هو المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت الخامس ديال مارتيلي خلال أربع سنين. قالت اللجنة الانتخابية الشهر اللي فات أن استقالة المجلس الانتخابي المؤقت جزء من الخطوات اللي غاتدفع البلاد لانتخابات جديدة. تشكيل اللجنة هو رد مارتيلي لانتشار المظاهرات المعادية للنظام الي بدت في اكتوبر لفشل فأنه يتدارو لنتخابات هو اللي سبب لمظاهرات اللي تيكون فيها دق شي مرات، شي وحدين من 2011.
mt: 9-member interim election commission was sworn in last night. It is the fifth interim election commission in four years. The election commission said last month that the resignation of the interim election commission was part of the steps that would lead the country to new elections. The formation of the commission is a response to the anti-government protests that began in October after the failure of the government to hold elections, which would be held twice, once in 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: - ناس الجمباز ديال مِريكان كيدعمو الرسالة ديال اللجنة الأولمبية و كيقبلو الحاجة الملحّة للعائلة الأولمبية باش يوفروا واحد البيئة آمنة لكاع الرياضيين. - حنا كنتّافقو مع البلاغ ديال اللجنة الأولمية و الباراألمبية على أن المصالح ديال الرياضيين و الأندية و الرياضة ديالهم يمكن نتعاملو معاهم حسن بزاف من هاكا إلا قلّبنا على تغيير ديال بصح فالمؤسسة ديالنا، بلاما نسحبو الشهادات. ناس الجمباز ديال مِريكان كيدعمو واحد التحقيق مستقل لي يمكن يبيّن شحال القدر ديال الإساءة للنسبة اللي توصفات بجرأة من طرف هادوك اللي نجاو من لاري نصار. يمكن متّعْرفش واخا من بعد مدة طويلة و يمكن يكون فيها تغييرات مهيمّة. عند الولايات المتحدة الأمريكية للجمباز واللجنة الاولمبية الامريكية (USOC) نفس الهدف - وهو يرجعوا رياضة الجمباز وغيرها، آمنة على قدر اامستطع للرياضيين باش يحققوا أحلامهم في بيئة آمنة وإيجابية وفيها مصدر تمكين.
mt: - We support the message of the IOC and USOC that the well-being of athletes and their families is paramount and that they deserve a safe environment.  - We agree with the statement of the IOC and USOC that the interests of athletes and their clubs and sports can be best served by working together, not by changing the structure of our organization, without losing our voice.  We support an independent investigation that can determine the extent of the abuse alleged by those who have come forward.  We may not know the answers for a long time and there may be significant changes.  The USOC and USA Gymnastics have the same goal - to ensure that gymnastics and other sports are safe for athletes to achieve their dreams in a safe and positive environment and one that empowers them.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "وقالت البحرية الأمريكية أنهم كانو تيحققوا فالحادث. وقالو أيضا فواحد بيان ""أن الطاقم حاليا تيخدم باش يلقى أحسن طريقة يخرجو بها السفينة بأمان"". واحد سفينة ديال الكشفٍ على الألغام موديل أفينجر، كانت السفينة غادية لبويرتو برنسيسا ف بالاوان. تصيفط للأسطول السابع للبحرية الأمريكية اللي لمقر ديالو في ساسيبو، ناجازاكي في اليابان."
mt: "The U.S. Navy said it was investigating the incident. It also said in a statement that the crew was working to determine the best way to get the ship out of the water safely." A minesweeper, the Avenger, was en route to Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It is part of the Seventh Fleet, which is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: قال الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب الأحد اللي فات فتصريح عبر من خلال السكريتير الصحفي أن الجنود الأمريكيين غادي يغادرو سوريا. هاد الإعلان جا من بعدما اتصل ترامب بالرئيس ديال تركيا طيب أردوغان. غادي تتكلف تركيا بالحراسة ديال الدواعش المسجونيين و اللي رفضات الدول الأوروبية باش ترجعهم لبلادهم كيفما جا فالبيان.
mt: President Donald Trump announced on Sunday that U.S. troops will leave Syria. The announcement came after Trump spoke with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey will be responsible for guarding the captured ISIS fighters and those who refused to return to their home countries as stated in the statement.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: تحركت قوات التحالف والقوات الأفغانية إلى المنطقة باش تامن الموقع وصيفطات طائرات التحالف الأخرى باش تعاون. هادشي وقع الفوق فمنطقة جبلية و كيظن أنها بسباب العافيا. كتواجه جهود التقلاب ف بلاصة التحطم واحد الجو خايب وتضاريس قاسحة.
mt: The coalition and Afghan forces moved into the area to secure the site and allow other coalition aircraft to land. This happened in a mountainous area and is believed to be due to bad weather and rugged terrain. The crash site is being hampered by poor weather and rugged terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: من بعد ما تبنى السد عام 1963، توقفت الفيضانات الموسمية اللي كان ممكن تنشر الرواسب ف الواد كلو. كانت هاد الرواسب مهمة باش دَّار حواجز رملية وشواطئ باش تكون فحال مساكن فّ للحياة البرية. ونتيجة لذاكشي، انقرضوا جوج أنواع ديال الحوت، وولاو جوج ديال الأنواع آخرين دابا معرضين للخطر، ومنهم الشوب الأحدب. وواخا منسوب المياه غادي يرتفع واحد العدد ديال الأقدام من بعد الفيضان، ولكن المسؤولين كيتمنوا أن هاذشي يكون كافي باش ترجع قضبان الرمال اللي اتكالت في اتجاه المجرى ديال الواد.
mt: 1963, the dam was built, the seasonal floods that could spread the silt in the river stopped. This silt was important to build sandbars and beaches to be in the form of homes for wildlife. As a result, two species of whale have become extinct, and two other species are now endangered, including the humpback whale. And when the water level will rise by a number of feet after the flood, but officials hope that this will be enough to return the sandbars that have been directed in the direction of the river.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "سفارة الولايات المتحدة الموجودة فْ نيروبي بكينيا حدْرات ""أن المتطرفين من الصومال"" كيخططو باش يديرو هجمات انتحارية في كينيا و إتوبيا. كتقول الولايات المتحدة أنها توصلات بمعلومات من مصدر مابغاش يتَّعرَفْ كيهضر بالضبط على استخدام المفجرين الانتحاريين باش يفجرو ""المعالم البارزة"" فْ إتوبيا و كينيا."
mt: "The U.S. embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, warned that "Somali extremists" are planning attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The United States says it has received information from an unidentified source that the militants are planning to use suicide bombers to attack "prominent" sites in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
